namespace = DG_Zoroastrian
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Zoroastrian.001
	title = ai_only.t
	desc = ai_only.d
	picture = ai_only
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			set_country_flag = zoroastrian_event
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			random = { 
				chance = 80
				set_country_flag = zoroastrian_event
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			random = { 
				chance = 60
				set_country_flag = zoroastrian_event
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			random = { 
				chance = 40
				set_country_flag = zoroastrian_event
			}
		}
		else = { 
			random = { 
				chance = 20
				set_country_flag = zoroastrian_event
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = zoroastrianism_reformed
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = progressive_zoroastrianism
					NOT = { 
						has_country_modifier = progressive_zoroastrianism
					}
				}
				add_country_modifier = { 
					name = progressive_zoroastrianism
					duration = -1
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = traditionalist_zoroastrianism
					NOT = { 
						has_country_modifier = traditionalist_zoroastrianism
					}
				}
				add_country_modifier = { 
					name = traditionalist_zoroastrianism
					duration = -1
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = restorationist_zoroastrianism
					NOT = { 
						has_country_modifier = restorationist_zoroastrianism
					}
				}
				add_country_modifier = { 
					name = restorationist_zoroastrianism
					duration = -1
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = zoroastrian_brethren_mission
					has_country_flag = zoroastrian_event
					NOT = { 
						has_country_modifier = religious_controversy
					}
					NOT = { 
						has_country_modifier = religious_scandal_country_strong
					}
					NOT = { 
						has_country_modifier = religious_scandal_country
					}
					NOT = { 
						has_country_modifier = religious_scandal_country_weak
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_country_flag = zoroastrian_debate_women
						}
					}
					random = { 
						chance = 25
						country_event = { 
							id = DG_Zoroastrian.073
							days = 30
							random = 180
						}
						clr_country_flag = zoroastrian_event
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_country_flag = zoroastrian_debate_caste
						}

							id = DG_Zoroastrian.074
							days = 30
							random = 180
						}
						clr_country_flag = zoroastrian_event

				else_if = {

							days = 30
							random = 180

						clr_country_flag = zoroastrian_event

				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						has_country_flag = zoroastrian_debate_calendar
						has_country_flag = zoroastrian_debate_caste
						has_country_flag = zoroastrian_debate_women
						NOT = { 
							has_country_flag = zoroastrian_debate_intermarriage
						}
					}
					random = { 
						chance = 10
						country_event = { 
							id = DG_Zoroastrian.077
							days = 30
							random = 180
						}
						clr_country_flag = zoroastrian_event
					}
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						has_country_flag = zoroastrian_brethren_mission
					}
					NOT = { 
						has_country_flag = zoroastrian_brethren_mission_returns
					}
					is_at_war = no
					stability = 0
					has_country_flag = zoroastrian_event
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Zoroastrian.071
					days = 30
					random = 180
				}
				clr_country_flag = zoroastrian_event
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = zoroastrian_rivayats
						value = 3
					}
					NOT = { 
						has_country_flag = zoroastrian_rivayats_collected
					}
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Zoroastrian.078
					days = 30
					random = 180
				}
				clr_country_flag = zoroastrian_event
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_ruler_flag = substitute_marriage
				NOT = { 
					has_ruler_flag = substitute_marriage_events
				}
			}
			random = { 
				chance = 10
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Zoroastrian.024
					days = 30
					random = 180
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					event_target:zoroastrian_great_fire_priests = { 
						owned_by = ROOT
						NOT = { 
							has_province_modifier = zoroastrian_great_fire_priests
						}
					}
					event_target:zoroastrian_great_fire_warriors = { 
						owned_by = ROOT
						NOT = { 
							has_province_modifier = zoroastrian_great_fire_warriors
						}
					}
					event_target:zoroastrian_great_fire_farmers = { 
						owned_by = ROOT
						NOT = { 
							has_province_modifier = zoroastrian_great_fire_farmers
						}
					}
				}
				has_country_flag = zoroastrian_event
			}
			random_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					OR = { 
						event_target:zoroastrian_great_fire_priests = { 
							province_id = PREV
						}

							province_id = PREV
						}

					}

					days = 30

			}

						days = 30

									days = 30
									random = 180
								}
								clr_country_flag = zoroastrian_event

						}

							}
						}

								if = { 
									limit = { 
										OR = { 
											has_country_modifier = caste_system_loose
											has_country_modifier = caste_system_relaxed

									}

										days = 30
										random = 180
									}
									clr_country_flag = zoroastrian_event

province_event = { 
	id = DG_Zoroastrian.002
	title = DG_Zoroastrian.002.t
	desc = DG_Zoroastrian.002.d
	picture = zoroastrian_religion
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				event_target:zoroastrian_great_fire_priests = { 
					province_id = ROOT
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = DG_Zoroastrian.002.priests
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				event_target:zoroastrian_great_fire_warriors = { 
					province_id = ROOT
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = DG_Zoroastrian.002.warriors
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				event_target:zoroastrian_great_fire_farmers = { 
					province_id = ROOT
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = DG_Zoroastrian.002.farmers
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.002.a
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				event_target:zoroastrian_great_fire_priests = { 
					province_id = ROOT
				}
			}
			add_province_modifier = { 
				name = zoroastrian_great_fire_priests
				duration = -1
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				event_target:zoroastrian_great_fire_warriors = { 
					province_id = ROOT
				}
			}
			add_province_modifier = { 
				name = zoroastrian_great_fire_warriors
				duration = -1
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				event_target:zoroastrian_great_fire_farmers = { 
					province_id = ROOT
				}
			}
			add_province_modifier = { 
				name = zoroastrian_great_fire_farmers
				duration = -1

								has_terrain = forest_hills

						which = arf
					}
					divide_variable = { 
						which = aee
						which = arf
					}
					divide_variable = { 
						which = aeg
						which = arf
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arf
					value = 0
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = aef
						value = 1
					}
					NOT = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = aer
							value = 0.01
						}
						check_variable = { 
							which = aes
							value = 0.01
						}
						check_variable = { 
							which = aeg
							value = 0.01
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = aer
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = aes
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = aeg

					which = axe

				set_variable = { 
					which = axx
					value = 0

					which = jwl
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = jxi
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = aef
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arf
					which = aeh
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = arf
					which = aej
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = arf
					which = ael
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = arf
					which = aen
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = arf
					which = aep
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = arf
					which = aer
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = adv
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aeh
							value = 1
						}
					}
					if = {

							check_variable = { 
								which = adx
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aej
							value = 1
						}
					}

								value = 1

						set_variable = { 
							which = ael
							value = 1

								which = aeb
								value = 1

						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aen
							value = 1
						}
					}
					if = {

								which = aed
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aep
							value = 1
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = aef
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aer
							value = 1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = aeh
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = aej
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = ael
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = aen
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = aep
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = aer
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = arf
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					divide_variable = { 
						which = aeh
						which = arf
					}
					divide_variable = { 
						which = aej
						which = arf
					}
					divide_variable = { 
						which = ael
						which = arf
					}
					divide_variable = { 
						which = aen
						which = arf
					}
					divide_variable = { 
						which = aep
						which = arf
					}
					divide_variable = { 
						which = aer
						which = arf
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arf
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arf
					which = aei
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = arf
					which = aek
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = arf
					which = aem
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = arf
					which = aeo
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = arf
					which = aeq
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = arf
					which = aes
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = adv
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aei
							value = 1
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = adx
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aek
							value = 1
						}
					}
					if = {

							check_variable = { 
								which = adz
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aem
							value = 1

								which = aeb
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aeo
							value = 1
						}

						set_variable = {

								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aes
							value = 1

								value = 0

						which = arf
					}

					}
					change_variable = {

						which = aeg
					}

				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = arf
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					divide_variable = { 
						which = adw
						which = arf
					}
					divide_variable = { 
						which = ady
						which = arf
					}
					divide_variable = { 
						which = aea
						which = arf
					}
					divide_variable = { 
						which = aec
						which = arf
					}
					divide_variable = { 
						which = aee
						which = arf
					}
					divide_variable = { 
						which = aeg
						which = arf
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arf
					value = 0
				}
			}
		}
		owner = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.60
				}
				add_prestige = 5
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.20
				}
				add_prestige = 4
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				add_prestige = 3
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				add_prestige = 2
			}
			else = { 
				add_prestige = 1
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = 2.5
				add_devotion = 5
				add_republican_tradition = 1.25
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = 2
				add_devotion = 4
				add_republican_tradition = 1
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = 1.5
				add_devotion = 3
				add_republican_tradition = 0.75
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = 1
				add_devotion = 2
				add_republican_tradition = 0.5
			}
			else = { 
				add_legitimacy = 0.5
				add_devotion = 1
				add_republican_tradition = 0.25
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				event_target:zoroastrian_great_fire_priests = { 
					owner = { 
						NOT = { 
							religion = zoroastrian
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:zoroastrian_great_fire_priests = { 
				add_claim = ROOT
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				event_target:zoroastrian_great_fire_warriors = { 
					owner = { 
						NOT = { 
							religion = zoroastrian
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:zoroastrian_great_fire_warriors = { 
				add_claim = PREV
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				event_target:zoroastrian_great_fire_farmers = { 
					owner = { 
						NOT = { 
							religion = zoroastrian
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:zoroastrian_great_fire_farmers = { 
				add_claim = PREV
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Zoroastrian.021
	title = ai_only.t
	desc = ai_only.d
	picture = ai_only
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		random_list = { 
			80 = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Zoroastrian.022
					days = 30
				}
			}
			20 = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						heir_age = 18
					}
					country_event = { 
						id = DG_Zoroastrian.022
						days = 30
					}
				}
				else = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = DG_Zoroastrian.023
						days = 30
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = ai_only.a
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Zoroastrian.022
	title = DG_Zoroastrian.022.t
	desc = DG_Zoroastrian.022.d
	picture = zoroastrian_marriage
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		check_variable = { 
			which = dynastic_incest
			value = -5
		}
	}
	immediate = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = dynastic_incest
						value = 3
					}
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = zoroastrian_incest_unaccepted
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = zoroastrian_marriage_restored
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = zoroastrian_marriage_restored
			custom_tooltip = zoroastrian_incest_firstime
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.022.a
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 30
			modifier = { 
				piety = 0.60
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				piety = 0.20
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		trigger = { 
			check_variable = { 
				which = dynastic_incest
				value = -3
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			change_variable = { 
				which = dynastic_incest
				value = 1
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_ruler_modifier = { 
				name = dynastic_incest_fanatical
				duration = -1
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_ruler_modifier = { 
				name = dynastic_incest_pious
				duration = -1
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_ruler_modifier = { 
				name = dynastic_incest_observant
				duration = -1
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_ruler_modifier = { 
				name = dynastic_incest_decadent
				duration = -1
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = dynastic_incest
						value = 3
					}
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.60
				}
				add_country_modifier = { 
					name = religious_scandal_country_weak
					duration = 500
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.20
				}
				add_country_modifier = { 
					name = religious_scandal_country_weak
					duration = 1000
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				add_country_modifier = { 
					name = religious_scandal_country
					duration = 1000
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				add_country_modifier = { 
					name = religious_scandal_country
					duration = 2000
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.022.b
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 60
		}
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = dynastic_incest
					value = 6
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			change_variable = { 
				which = dynastic_incest
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.022.c
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 10
			modifier = { 
				piety = 0.60
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = { 
				piety = 0.20
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = dynastic_incest
					value = 3
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			change_variable = { 
				which = dynastic_incest
				value = -2
			}
		}
		random_list = { 
			20 = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					change_variable = { 
						which = ahf
						value = 600
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								stability = 3
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
						}
						else = { 
							subtract_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
							add_stability = 1
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ahf
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									stability = -2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 0
							}
						}
						else = { 
							change_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
							add_stability = -1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						which = ahf
					}
					divide_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 12
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 0.1
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 10
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = lsc
						value = 100
					}
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = lsc
						which = ahd
					}
				}
				custom_tooltip = POP_StabAdd50
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_emperor_of_china = yes
					}
					add_mandate = 2.5
				}
			}
			20 = { 
				add_prestige = 5
			}
			20 = { 
				add_years_of_income = 0.08
			}
			40 = { }
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_scandal_country
				duration = 2000
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_scandal_country
				duration = 1000
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_scandal_country_weak
				duration = 1000
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_scandal_country_weak
				duration = 500
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Zoroastrian.023
	title = DG_Zoroastrian.023.t
	desc = DG_Zoroastrian.023.d
	picture = zoroastrian_marriage
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_female = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = DG_Zoroastrian.023.female
		}
		else = { 
			custom_tooltip = DG_Zoroastrian.023.male
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					has_dlc = "The Cossacks"
				}
			}
			random_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					OR = { 
						has_owner_culture = yes
						AND = { 
							OR = { 
								AND = { 
									owner = { 
										total_development = 1200
									}
									culture_group = owner
								}
								has_owner_accepted_culture = yes
							}
							has_owner_religion = yes
						}
					}
				}
				set_province_flag = queensland
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						owner = { 
							num_of_cities = 30
						}
					}
					every_province = { 
						limit = { 
							area = PREV
							owned_by = ROOT
						}
						set_province_flag = queensland
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						owner = { 
							num_of_cities = 90
						}
					}
					every_province = { 
						limit = { 
							region = PREV
							owned_by = ROOT
						}
						set_province_flag = queensland
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.023.female_heir
		trigger = { 
			is_female = yes
			has_heir = yes
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 10
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					heir_adm = 1
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					heir_dip = 1
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					heir_mil = 1
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					heir_adm = 2
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					heir_dip = 2
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					heir_mil = 2
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				heir_adm = 3
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				heir_dip = 3
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				heir_mil = 4
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				heir_adm = 4
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				heir_dip = 4
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				heir_mil = 4
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				heir_adm = 5
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				heir_dip = 5
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				heir_mil = 5
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				heir_adm = 6
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = { 
				heir_dip = 6
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = { 
				heir_mil = 6
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		exile_heir_as = substitute_marriage_heir
		set_ruler_flag = substitute_marriage_heir

					prestige = 0
				}
				factor = 0.5

				piety = 0.20

				piety = -0.20

		}

			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_prestige = -2
		}

			add_prestige = -1
		}

		hidden_effect = { 
			every_owned_province = { 
				clr_province_flag = queensland
			}
		}
	}

		name = DG_Zoroastrian.023.refuse
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 10
			modifier = { 
				num_of_revolts = 1
				factor = 0.5
			}

				is_at_war = yes
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					manpower_percentage = 0.75
				}
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					manpower_percentage = 0.50
				}
				factor = 0.5
			}
		}

				has_province_flag = queensland

					which = added_unrest
					value = 5
				}
				hidden_effect = {

						id = stacking_unrest.002
					}
				}
			}

		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_owned_province = { 
				clr_province_flag = queensland
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Zoroastrian.024
	title = DG_Zoroastrian.024.t
	desc = DG_Zoroastrian.024.d
	picture = zoroastrian_religion
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		set_ruler_flag = substitute_marriage_events
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_ruler_flag = substitute_marriage_heir
			}
			custom_tooltip = DG_Zoroastrian.024.heir
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					has_ruler_flag = substitute_marriage_firstborn
					has_ruler_flag = substitute_marriage_secondborn
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					has_heir = yes
				}
				custom_tooltip = DG_Zoroastrian.024.replace
			}
			else = { 
				custom_tooltip = DG_Zoroastrian.024.new
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_ruler_flag = substitute_marriage_concubine
			}
			custom_tooltip = DG_Zoroastrian.024.concubine
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			remove_country_modifier = substitute_marriage_heir
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.024.recall
		trigger = { 
			OR = { 
				AND = { 
					has_heir = yes
					has_ruler_flag = substitute_marriage_heir
				}
				AND = { 
					has_ruler_flag = substitute_marriage_firstborn
					NOT = { 
						has_heir = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 15
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					has_heir = yes
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					heir_adm = 1
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					heir_dip = 1
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					heir_mil = 1
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					heir_adm = 2
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					heir_dip = 2
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					heir_mil = 2
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				heir_adm = 3
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				heir_dip = 3
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				heir_mil = 4
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				heir_adm = 4
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				heir_dip = 4
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				heir_mil = 4
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				heir_adm = 5
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				heir_dip = 5
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				heir_mil = 5
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				heir_adm = 6
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = { 
				heir_dip = 6
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = { 
				heir_mil = 6
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		add_prestige = -25
		remove_country_modifier = substitute_marriage
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_ruler_flag = substitute_marriage_heir
			}
			set_heir = substitute_marriage_heir
		}
		else = { 
			remove_country_modifier = substitute_marriage
			add_legitimacy = -20
			add_republican_tradition = -20
			add_horde_unity = -20
			add_devotion = -20
			define_heir = { 
				religion = zoroastrian
				claim = 70
				dynasty = ROOT
				age = 0
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.024.agreement
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 55
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					has_ruler_flag = substitute_marriage_concubine
				}
			}
			add_heir_claim = -10
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						has_dlc = "The Cossacks"
					}
				}
				add_country_modifier = { 
					name = substitute_marriage
					duration = 7300
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.024.favor_new
		trigger = { 
			has_heir = yes
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 15
			modifier = { 
				has_ruler_flag = substitute_marriage_concubine
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					heir_adm = 1
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					heir_dip = 1
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					heir_mil = 1
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					heir_adm = 2
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					heir_dip = 2
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					heir_mil = 2
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				heir_adm = 3
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				heir_dip = 3
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				heir_mil = 4
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				heir_adm = 4
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				heir_dip = 4
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				heir_mil = 4
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				heir_adm = 5
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				heir_dip = 5
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				heir_mil = 5
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				heir_adm = 6
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = { 
				heir_dip = 6
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = { 
				heir_mil = 6
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_ruler_flag = substitute_marriage_concubine
			}
			add_prestige = -30
			add_legitimacy = -30
			add_republican_tradition = -30
			add_horde_unity = -30
			add_devotion = -30
			define_heir = { 
				religion = zoroastrian
				claim = 40
				dynasty = ROOT
				age = 0
			}
		}
		else = { 
			add_prestige = -20
			add_legitimacy = -20
			add_republican_tradition = -20
			add_horde_unity = -20
			add_devotion = -20
			define_heir = { 
				religion = zoroastrian
				claim = 70
				dynasty = ROOT
				age = 0
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.024.murder
		trigger = { 
			has_heir = yes
			has_ruler_flag = substitute_marriage_concubine
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 15
		}
		add_prestige = -25
		add_heir_claim = 30
	}
}

	}

		name = DG_Zoroastrian.025.accept
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 50
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_prestige = -15
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_prestige = -12
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_prestige = -9
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_prestige = -6
		}
		else = { 
			add_prestige = -3
		}
		add_ruler_modifier = { 
			name = ancillary_marriage
			duration = -1
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.025.refuse
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 50
		}

				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_prestige = -5
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_prestige = -4
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_prestige = -3
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_prestige = -2
		}
		else = { 
			add_prestige = -1
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Zoroastrian.026
	title = DG_Zoroastrian.026.t
	desc = DG_Zoroastrian.026.d
	picture = zoroastrian_religion
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = zoroastrian_philanthropy_closed
			}
			custom_tooltip = DG_Zoroastrian.026.d_religious
		}
		else = { 
			custom_tooltip = DG_Zoroastrian.026.d_soul
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.026.prayer
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 20
			modifier = { 
				has_country_flag = zoroastrian_philanthropy_closed
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					legitimacy = 80
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					legitimacy = 70
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		add_years_of_income = -0.08
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = zoroastrian_philanthropy_closed
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = 2.5
				add_devotion = 5
				add_republican_tradition = 1.25
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = 2
				add_devotion = 4
				add_republican_tradition = 1
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = 1.5
				add_devotion = 3
				add_republican_tradition = 0.75
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = 1
				add_devotion = 2
				add_republican_tradition = 0.5
			}
			else = { 
				add_legitimacy = 0.5
				add_devotion = 1
				add_republican_tradition = 0.25
			}
		}
		else = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = 5
				add_devotion = 10
				add_republican_tradition = 2.5
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = 4
				add_devotion = 8
				add_republican_tradition = 2
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = 3
				add_devotion = 6
				add_republican_tradition = 1.5
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = 2
				add_devotion = 4
				add_republican_tradition = 1
			}
			else = { 
				add_legitimacy = 1
				add_devotion = 2
				add_republican_tradition = 0.5
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = zoroastrian_philanthropy_closed
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.026.embezzle
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 10
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					years_of_income = 0.08
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				num_of_loans = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				num_of_loans = 3
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = zoroastrian_philanthropy_closed
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = -5
				add_devotion = -10
				add_republican_tradition = -2.5
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = -4
				add_devotion = -8
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = -3
				add_devotion = -6
				add_republican_tradition = -1.5
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_devotion = -4
				add_republican_tradition = -1
			}
			else = { 
				add_legitimacy = -1
				add_devotion = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -0.5
			}
		}
		else = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = -2.5
				add_devotion = -5
				add_republican_tradition = -1.25
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_devotion = -4
				add_republican_tradition = -1
			}
			else_if = {

					piety = -0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = -1.5
				add_devotion = -3
				add_republican_tradition = -0.75
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = -1
				add_devotion = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -0.5
			}
			else = { 
				add_legitimacy = -0.5
				add_devotion = -1
				add_republican_tradition = -0.25
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = zoroastrian_philanthropy_closed
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.026.charity
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = church_property
					value = 13
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 10
		}
		clr_country_flag = zoroastrian_philanthropy_closed
		add_years_of_income = -0.08
		add_patriarch_authority = 0.05
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = zoroastrian_philanthropy_closed
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = 2.5
				add_devotion = 5
				add_republican_tradition = 1.25
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = 2

				add_republican_tradition = 1
			}
			else_if = {

					piety = -0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = 1.5

			else_if = {

			}
			else = { 
				add_legitimacy = 0.5
				add_devotion = 1
				add_republican_tradition = 0.25
			}
		}
		else = {

					piety = -0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = 3
				add_devotion = 6
				add_republican_tradition = 1.5
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = 2
				add_devotion = 4
				add_republican_tradition = 1
			}
			else = { 
				add_legitimacy = 1
				add_devotion = 2
				add_republican_tradition = 0.5
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.026.temples
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 20
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					legitimacy = 80
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					legitimacy = 70
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		add_years_of_income = -0.08
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = zoroastrian_philanthropy_closed
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = 2.5
				add_devotion = 5
				add_republican_tradition = 1.25
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = 2
				add_devotion = 4
				add_republican_tradition = 1
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = 1.5
				add_devotion = 3
				add_republican_tradition = 0.75
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = 1
				add_devotion = 2
				add_republican_tradition = 0.5
			}
			else = { 
				add_legitimacy = 0.5
				add_devotion = 1
				add_republican_tradition = 0.25
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.60
				}
				add_prestige = 5
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.20
				}
				add_prestige = 4
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				add_prestige = 3
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				add_prestige = 2
			}
			else = { 
				add_prestige = 1
			}
		}
		else = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.60
				}
				add_prestige = 15
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.20
				}
				add_prestige = 12
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				add_prestige = 9
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				add_prestige = 6
			}
			else = { 
				add_prestige = 3
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = 5
				add_devotion = 10
				add_republican_tradition = 2.5
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = 4
				add_devotion = 8
				add_republican_tradition = 2
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = 3
				add_devotion = 6
				add_republican_tradition = 1.5
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = 2
				add_devotion = 4
				add_republican_tradition = 1
			}
			else = { 
				add_legitimacy = 1
				add_devotion = 2
				add_republican_tradition = 0.5
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = zoroastrian_philanthropy_closed
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.026.public
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				stability = 2
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 10
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					ADM = 2
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					ADM = 3
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		add_years_of_income = -0.08
		add_adm_power = 25
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = zoroastrian_philanthropy_closed
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.60
				}
				add_prestige = -5
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.20
				}
				add_prestige = -4
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				add_prestige = -3
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				add_prestige = -2
			}
			else = { 
				add_prestige = -1
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = zoroastrian_philanthropy_closed
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.026.overturn
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 10
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					years_of_income = 0.08
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				num_of_loans = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				num_of_loans = 3
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					legitimacy = 80
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					legitimacy = 70
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					prestige = 0
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		add_years_of_income = 0.08
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_prestige = -15
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_prestige = -12
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_prestige = -9
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_prestige = -6
		}
		else = { 
			add_prestige = -3
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_legitimacy = -5
			add_devotion = -10
			add_republican_tradition = -2.5
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_legitimacy = -4
			add_devotion = -8
			add_republican_tradition = -2
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_legitimacy = -3
			add_devotion = -6
			add_republican_tradition = -1.5
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_legitimacy = -2
			add_devotion = -4
			add_republican_tradition = -1
		}
		else = { 
			add_legitimacy = -1
			add_devotion = -2
			add_republican_tradition = -0.5
		}
		clr_country_flag = zoroastrian_philanthropy_closed
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Zoroastrian.041
	title = DG_Zoroastrian.041.t
	desc = DG_Zoroastrian.041.d
	picture = zoroastrian_priests
	trigger = { 
		religion = zoroastrian
		NOT = { 
			government = theocracy
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = secular_courts
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = patriarch_obedient
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					has_advisor = yes
				}
				random = { 
					chance = 50
					set_country_flag = dispute_advisor
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						has_country_flag = dispute_advisor
					}
					num_of_merchants = 1
				}
				random = { 
					chance = 30
					set_country_flag = dispute_merchant
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						has_country_flag = dispute_advisor
					}
					NOT = { 
						has_country_flag = dispute_merchant
					}
				}
				set_country_flag = dispute_noble
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.041.a
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 75
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					legitimacy = 100
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					legitimacy = 80
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					legitimacy = 60
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					legitimacy = 40
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_legitimacy = -5
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_legitimacy = -4
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_legitimacy = -3
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_legitimacy = -2
		}
		else = { 
			add_legitimacy = -1
		}
		clr_country_flag = dispute_merchant
		clr_country_flag = dispute_noble
		clr_country_flag = dispute_advisor
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.041.b
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 25
			modifier = { 
				piety = 0.60
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				piety = 0.20
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = dispute_advisor
			}
			remove_advisor = random
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = dispute_merchant
			}
			random_active_trade_node = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						has_trade_modifier = { 
							who = ROOT
							name = unhappy_merchant
						}
					}
				}
				add_trade_modifier = { 
					who = ROOT
					duration = 500
					power = -10
					key = unhappy_merchant
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = dispute_noble
			}
			random_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					has_owner_culture = yes
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					set_variable = { 
						which = added_unrest
						value = 2
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						province_event = { 
							id = stacking_unrest.002
						}
					}
				}
				custom_tooltip = added_unrest_2
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_prestige = -0.5
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_prestige = -1
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_prestige = -1.5
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_prestige = -2
		}
		else = { 
			add_prestige = -2.5
		}
		clr_country_flag = dispute_merchant
		clr_country_flag = dispute_noble
		clr_country_flag = dispute_advisor
	}
}
province_event = { 
	id = DG_Zoroastrian.042
	title = DG_Zoroastrian.042.t
	desc = DG_Zoroastrian.042.d
	picture = zoroastrian_parsis
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.042.a
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 50
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					piety = 0.60
				}
			}
			owner = { 
				add_prestige = 2
			}
			add_province_modifier = { 
				name = zoroastrian_pilgrimage
				duration = 4000
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					piety = 0.20
				}
			}
			owner = { 
				add_prestige = 1.5
			}
			add_province_modifier = { 
				name = zoroastrian_pilgrimage
				duration = 2000
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
			}
			owner = { 
				add_prestige = 1
			}
			add_province_modifier = { 
				name = zoroastrian_pilgrimage
				duration = 1000
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
			}
			owner = { 
				add_prestige = 0.5
			}
			add_province_modifier = { 
				name = zoroastrian_pilgrimage
				duration = 500
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.042.b
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 50
			modifier = { 
				owner = { 
					piety = 0.60
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				owner = { 
					piety = 0.20
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				owner = { 
					NOT = { 
						piety = -0.20
					}
				}
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				owner = { 
					monthly_income = 10
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				owner = { 
					monthly_income = 20
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				owner = { 
					monthly_income = 40
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				owner = { 
					monthly_income = 80
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				owner = { 
					num_of_loans = 1
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = { 
				owner = { 
					num_of_loans = 2
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = { 
				owner = { 
					is_bankrupt = yes
				}
				factor = 0.5
			}
		}
		owner = { 
			add_treasury = -10
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					piety = 0.60
				}
			}
			owner = { 
				add_legitimacy = 4
			}
			add_province_modifier = { 
				name = zoroastrian_pilgrimage
				duration = 16000
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					piety = 0.20
				}
			}
			owner = { 
				add_legitimacy = 3
			}
			add_province_modifier = { 
				name = zoroastrian_pilgrimage
				duration = 8000
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
			}
			owner = { 
				add_legitimacy = 2
			}
			add_province_modifier = { 
				name = zoroastrian_pilgrimage
				duration = 4000
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
			}
			owner = { 
				add_legitimacy = 1
			}
			add_province_modifier = { 
				name = zoroastrian_pilgrimage
				duration = 2000
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Zoroastrian.043
	title = DG_Zoroastrian.043.t
	desc = DG_Zoroastrian.043.d
	picture = zoroastrian_religion
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = zoroastrian_priesthood_reestablished
			}
			custom_tooltip = DG_Zoroastrian.043.high_priest
		}
		else = { 
			custom_tooltip = DG_Zoroastrian.043.priesthood
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_modifier = zoroastrian_female_priests
			}
			custom_tooltip = DG_Zoroastrian.043.d_women
		}
		else = { 
			custom_tooltip = DG_Zoroastrian.043.d_men
		}
		set_ruler_flag = zoroastrian_sofre_controversy
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.043.support
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 25
			modifier = { 
				has_country_modifier = zoroastrian_female_priests
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				piety = 0.20
				factor = 1.4
			}

				piety = 0.60
				factor = 1.4
			}

				has_country_flag = patriarch_obedient

			}

				factor = 2
			}
		}

			}
			if = {

						DIP = 4
					}
					DIP = 3
				}
				random = { 
					chance = 40

			}
			modifier = { 
				has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_polytheism_expurged
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				has_country_flag = patriarch_hostile
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		set_ruler_flag = zoroastrian_sacrifices_banned
		add_piety = -0.10
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_polytheism_expurged
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						DIP = 5
					}
					DIP = 4
				}
				random = { 
					chance = 20
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = 0.20
						}
						add_country_modifier = { 
							name = religious_scandal_country_strong
							duration = 400
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = -0.20
						}
						add_country_modifier = { 
							name = religious_scandal_country
							duration = 400
						}
					}
					else = { 
						add_country_modifier = { 
							name = religious_scandal_country_weak
							duration = 400
						}
					}
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						DIP = 4
					}
					DIP = 3
				}
				random = { 
					chance = 40
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = 0.20
						}
						add_country_modifier = { 
							name = religious_scandal_country_strong
							duration = 400
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = -0.20
						}
						add_country_modifier = { 
							name = religious_scandal_country
							duration = 400
						}
					}
					else = { 
						add_country_modifier = { 
							name = religious_scandal_country_weak
							duration = 400
						}
					}
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						DIP = 3
					}
					DIP = 2
				}
				random = { 
					chance = 60
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = 0.20
						}
						add_country_modifier = { 
							name = religious_scandal_country_strong
							duration = 400
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = -0.20
						}
						add_country_modifier = { 
							name = religious_scandal_country
							duration = 400
						}
					}
					else = { 
						add_country_modifier = { 
							name = religious_scandal_country_weak
							duration = 400
						}
					}
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						DIP = 2
					}
					DIP = 1
				}
				random = { 
					chance = 80
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = 0.20
						}
						add_country_modifier = { 
							name = religious_scandal_country_strong
							duration = 400
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = -0.20
						}
						add_country_modifier = { 
							name = religious_scandal_country
							duration = 400
						}
					}
					else = { 
						add_country_modifier = { 
							name = religious_scandal_country_weak
							duration = 400
						}
					}
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						DIP = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						piety = 0.20
					}
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = religious_scandal_country_strong
						duration = 400
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						piety = -0.20
					}
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = religious_scandal_country
						duration = 400
					}
				}
				else = { 
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = religious_scandal_country_weak
						duration = 400
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Zoroastrian.045
	title = DG_Zoroastrian.045.t
	desc = DG_Zoroastrian.045.d
	picture = zoroastrian_religion
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					num_of_generals = 2
					NOT = { 
						has_advisor = yes
					}
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = DG_Zoroastrian.045.general
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					OR = { 
						num_of_generals = 2
						NOT = { 
							has_advisor = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = DG_Zoroastrian.045.advisor
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.045.dismiss
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 30
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					num_of_generals = 2
					NOT = { 
						has_advisor = yes
					}
				}
			}
			kill_leader = { 
				type = random
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					OR = { 
						num_of_generals = 2
						NOT = { 
							has_advisor = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
			kill_advisor = random
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.045.defend
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 40
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				monthly_income = 4.2
			}
			add_years_of_income = -0.10
		}
		else = { 
			add_treasury = -5
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_legitimacy = 5
			add_devotion = 10
			add_republican_tradition = 2.5
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_legitimacy = 4
			add_devotion = 8
			add_republican_tradition = 2
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_legitimacy = 3
			add_devotion = 6
			add_republican_tradition = 1.5
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_legitimacy = 2
			add_devotion = 4
			add_republican_tradition = 1
		}
		else = { 
			add_legitimacy = 1
			add_devotion = 2
			add_republican_tradition = 0.5
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.045.ignore
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 30
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				piety = 0.20
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = { 
				piety = 0.60
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Zoroastrian.046
	title = DG_Zoroastrian.046.t
	desc = DG_Zoroastrian.046.d
	picture = zoroastrian_religion
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = zoroastrian_priesthood_reestablished
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = DG_Zoroastrian.046.d_no_patriarch
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					has_country_flag = patriarch_corrupt
					has_country_flag = patriarch_hostile
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = DG_Zoroastrian.046.d_patriarch
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.046.patriarch
		trigger = { 
			has_country_flag = zoroastrian_priesthood_reestablished
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = patriarch_corrupt
			}
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = patriarch_hostile
			}
			NOT = { 
				has_country_modifier = unhappy_church_powerful
			}
			NOT = { 
				has_country_modifier = unhappy_church_strong
			}
			NOT = { 
				has_country_modifier = unhappy_church_moderate
			}
			NOT = { 
				has_country_modifier = unhappy_church_weak
			}
			NOT = { 
				has_country_modifier = unhappy_church_impotent
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 50
			modifier = { 
				has_country_flag = patriarch_controversial
				factor = 0.5
			}
		}
		add_dip_power = -5
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = patriarch_controversial
			}
			random = { 
				chance = 30
				custom_tooltip = patriarch_becomes_hostile
				clr_country_flag = patriarch_hostile
				set_country_flag = patriarch_controversial
				clr_country_flag = patriarch_zealous
				clr_country_flag = patriarch_obedient
				clr_country_flag = patriarch_theologian
				clr_country_flag = patriarch_corrupt
			}
		}
		else = { 
			random = { 
				chance = 10
				custom_tooltip = patriarch_becomes_hostile
				clr_country_flag = patriarch_hostile
				set_country_flag = patriarch_controversial
				clr_country_flag = patriarch_zealous
				clr_country_flag = patriarch_obedient
				clr_country_flag = patriarch_theologian
				clr_country_flag = patriarch_corrupt
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.046.arrest
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 25
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				patriarch_authority = 0.80
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = unhappy_church_powerful
				duration = 400
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				patriarch_authority = 0.60
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = unhappy_church_strong
				duration = 400
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				patriarch_authority = 0.40
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = unhappy_church_moderate
				duration = 400
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				patriarch_authority = 0.20
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = unhappy_church_weak
				duration = 400
			}
		}
		else = { 
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = unhappy_church_impotent
				duration = 400
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.046.excuse
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 25
			modifier = { 
				government = monarchy
				NOT = { 
					legitimacy = 90
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = { 
				government = monarchy
				NOT = { 
					legitimacy = 80
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = { 
				government = monarchy
				NOT = { 
					legitimacy = 70
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = { 
				government = monarchy
				NOT = { 
					legitimacy = 60
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = { 
				government = republic
				NOT = { 
					republican_tradition = 90
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = { 
				government = republic
				NOT = { 
					republican_tradition = 80
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = { 
				government = republic
				NOT = { 
					republican_tradition = 70
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = { 
				government = republic
				NOT = { 
					republican_tradition = 60
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = { 
				government = theocracy
				NOT = { 
					devotion = 90
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = { 
				government = theocracy
				NOT = { 
					devotion = 80
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = { 
				government = theocracy
				NOT = { 
					devotion = 70
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = { 
				government = theocracy
				NOT = { 
					devotion = 60
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_legitimacy = -2.5
			add_devotion = -5
			add_republican_tradition = -1.25
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_legitimacy = -2
			add_devotion = -4
			add_republican_tradition = -1
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_legitimacy = -1.5
			add_devotion = -3
			add_republican_tradition = -0.75
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_legitimacy = -1
			add_devotion = -2
			add_republican_tradition = -0.5
		}
		else = { 
			add_legitimacy = -0.5
			add_devotion = -1
			add_republican_tradition = -0.25
		}
		random_owned_province = { 
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					is_capital = yes
					has_owner_religion = yes
				}
				is_city = yes
			}
			add_province_modifier = { 
				name = religious_scandal_province
				duration = 2000
			}
		}
	}
	after = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = patriarch_zealous
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					patriarch_authority = 0.75
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_country_modifier = patriarch_zealous_fanatical
						}
					}
					trigger_switch = { 
						on_trigger = has_country_modifier
						patriarch_zealous_observant = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_zealous_observant
						}
						patriarch_zealous_pious = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_zealous_pious
						}
					}
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = patriarch_zealous_fanatical
						duration = -1
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					patriarch_authority = 0.50
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_country_modifier = patriarch_zealous_pious
						}
					}
					trigger_switch = { 
						on_trigger = has_country_modifier
						patriarch_zealous_observant = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_zealous_observant
						}
						patriarch_zealous_fanatical = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_zealous_fanatical
						}
					}
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = patriarch_zealous_pious
						duration = -1
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					patriarch_authority = 0.10
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_country_modifier = patriarch_zealous_observant
						}
					}
					trigger_switch = { 
						on_trigger = has_country_modifier
						patriarch_zealous_pious = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_zealous_pious
						}
						patriarch_zealous_fanatical = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_zealous_fanatical
						}
					}
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = patriarch_zealous_observant
						duration = -1
					}
				}
			}
			else = { 
				trigger_switch = { 
					on_trigger = has_country_modifier
					patriarch_zealous_observant = { 
						remove_country_modifier = patriarch_zealous_observant
					}
					patriarch_zealous_pious = { 
						remove_country_modifier = patriarch_zealous_pious
					}
					patriarch_zealous_fanatical = { 
						remove_country_modifier = patriarch_zealous_fanatical
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			trigger_switch = { 
				on_trigger = has_country_modifier
				patriarch_zealous_observant = { 
					remove_country_modifier = patriarch_zealous_observant
				}
				patriarch_zealous_pious = { 
					remove_country_modifier = patriarch_zealous_pious
				}
				patriarch_zealous_fanatical = { 
					remove_country_modifier = patriarch_zealous_fanatical
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = patriarch_theologian
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					patriarch_authority = 0.75
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_country_modifier = patriarch_theologian_fanatical
						}
					}
					trigger_switch = { 
						on_trigger = has_country_modifier
						patriarch_theologian_observant = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_theologian_observant
						}
						patriarch_theologian_pious = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_theologian_pious
						}
					}
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = patriarch_theologian_fanatical
						duration = -1
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					patriarch_authority = 0.50
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_country_modifier = patriarch_theologian_pious
						}
					}
					trigger_switch = { 
						on_trigger = has_country_modifier
						patriarch_theologian_observant = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_theologian_observant
						}
						patriarch_theologian_fanatical = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_theologian_fanatical
						}
					}
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = patriarch_theologian_pious
						duration = -1
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					patriarch_authority = 0.10
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_country_modifier = patriarch_theologian_observant
						}
					}
					trigger_switch = { 
						on_trigger = has_country_modifier
						patriarch_theologian_pious = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_theologian_pious
						}
						patriarch_theologian_fanatical = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_theologian_fanatical
						}
					}
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = patriarch_theologian_observant
						duration = -1
					}
				}
			}
			else = { 
				trigger_switch = { 
					on_trigger = has_country_modifier
					patriarch_theologian_observant = { 
						remove_country_modifier = patriarch_theologian_observant
					}
					patriarch_theologian_pious = { 
						remove_country_modifier = patriarch_theologian_pious
					}
					patriarch_theologian_fanatical = { 
						remove_country_modifier = patriarch_theologian_fanatical
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			trigger_switch = { 
				on_trigger = has_country_modifier
				patriarch_theologian_observant = { 
					remove_country_modifier = patriarch_theologian_observant
				}
				patriarch_theologian_pious = { 
					remove_country_modifier = patriarch_theologian_pious
				}
				patriarch_theologian_fanatical = { 
					remove_country_modifier = patriarch_theologian_fanatical
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = patriarch_obedient
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					patriarch_authority = 0.75
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_country_modifier = patriarch_obedient_fanatical
						}
					}
					trigger_switch = { 
						on_trigger = has_country_modifier
						patriarch_obedient_observant = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_obedient_observant
						}
						patriarch_obedient_pious = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_obedient_pious
						}
					}
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = patriarch_obedient_fanatical
						duration = -1
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					patriarch_authority = 0.50
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_country_modifier = patriarch_obedient_pious
						}
					}
					trigger_switch = { 
						on_trigger = has_country_modifier
						patriarch_obedient_observant = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_obedient_observant
						}
						patriarch_obedient_fanatical = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_obedient_fanatical
						}
					}
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = patriarch_obedient_pious
						duration = -1
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					patriarch_authority = 0.10
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_country_modifier = patriarch_obedient_observant
						}
					}
					trigger_switch = { 
						on_trigger = has_country_modifier
						patriarch_obedient_pious = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_obedient_pious
						}
						patriarch_obedient_fanatical = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_obedient_fanatical
						}
					}
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = patriarch_obedient_observant
						duration = -1
					}
				}
			}
			else = { 
				trigger_switch = { 
					on_trigger = has_country_modifier
					patriarch_obedient_observant = { 
						remove_country_modifier = patriarch_obedient_observant
					}
					patriarch_obedient_pious = { 
						remove_country_modifier = patriarch_obedient_pious
					}
					patriarch_obedient_fanatical = { 
						remove_country_modifier = patriarch_obedient_fanatical
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			trigger_switch = { 
				on_trigger = has_country_modifier
				patriarch_obedient_observant = { 
					remove_country_modifier = patriarch_obedient_observant
				}
				patriarch_obedient_pious = { 
					remove_country_modifier = patriarch_obedient_pious
				}
				patriarch_obedient_fanatical = { 
					remove_country_modifier = patriarch_obedient_fanatical
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = patriarch_controversial
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					patriarch_authority = 0.75
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_country_modifier = patriarch_controversial_fanatical
						}
					}
					trigger_switch = { 
						on_trigger = has_country_modifier
						patriarch_controversial_observant = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_controversial_observant
						}
						patriarch_controversial_pious = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_controversial_pious
						}
					}
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = patriarch_controversial_fanatical
						duration = -1
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					patriarch_authority = 0.50
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_country_modifier = patriarch_controversial_pious
						}
					}
					trigger_switch = { 
						on_trigger = has_country_modifier
						patriarch_controversial_observant = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_controversial_observant
						}
						patriarch_controversial_fanatical = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_controversial_fanatical
						}
					}
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = patriarch_controversial_pious
						duration = -1
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					patriarch_authority = 0.10
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_country_modifier = patriarch_controversial_observant
						}
					}
					trigger_switch = { 
						on_trigger = has_country_modifier
						patriarch_controversial_pious = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_controversial_pious
						}
						patriarch_controversial_fanatical = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_controversial_fanatical
						}
					}
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = patriarch_controversial_observant
						duration = -1
					}
				}
			}
			else = { 
				trigger_switch = { 
					on_trigger = has_country_modifier
					patriarch_controversial_observant = { 
						remove_country_modifier = patriarch_controversial_observant
					}
					patriarch_controversial_pious = { 
						remove_country_modifier = patriarch_controversial_pious
					}
					patriarch_controversial_fanatical = { 
						remove_country_modifier = patriarch_controversial_fanatical
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			trigger_switch = { 
				on_trigger = has_country_modifier
				patriarch_controversial_observant = { 
					remove_country_modifier = patriarch_controversial_observant
				}
				patriarch_controversial_pious = { 
					remove_country_modifier = patriarch_controversial_pious
				}
				patriarch_controversial_fanatical = { 
					remove_country_modifier = patriarch_controversial_fanatical
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = patriarch_corrupt
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					patriarch_authority = 0.75
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_country_modifier = patriarch_corrupt_fanatical
						}
					}
					trigger_switch = { 
						on_trigger = has_country_modifier
						patriarch_corrupt_observant = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_corrupt_observant
						}
						patriarch_corrupt_pious = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_corrupt_pious
						}
					}
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = patriarch_corrupt_fanatical
						duration = -1
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					patriarch_authority = 0.50
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_country_modifier = patriarch_corrupt_pious
						}
					}
					trigger_switch = { 
						on_trigger = has_country_modifier
						patriarch_corrupt_observant = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_corrupt_observant
						}
						patriarch_corrupt_fanatical = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_corrupt_fanatical
						}
					}
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = patriarch_corrupt_pious
						duration = -1
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					patriarch_authority = 0.10
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_country_modifier = patriarch_corrupt_observant
						}
					}
					trigger_switch = { 
						on_trigger = has_country_modifier
						patriarch_corrupt_pious = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_corrupt_pious
						}
						patriarch_corrupt_fanatical = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_corrupt_fanatical
						}
					}
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = patriarch_corrupt_observant
						duration = -1
					}
				}
			}
			else = { 
				trigger_switch = { 
					on_trigger = has_country_modifier
					patriarch_corrupt_observant = { 
						remove_country_modifier = patriarch_corrupt_observant
					}
					patriarch_corrupt_pious = { 
						remove_country_modifier = patriarch_corrupt_pious
					}
					patriarch_corrupt_fanatical = { 
						remove_country_modifier = patriarch_corrupt_fanatical
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			trigger_switch = { 
				on_trigger = has_country_modifier
				patriarch_corrupt_observant = { 
					remove_country_modifier = patriarch_corrupt_observant
				}
				patriarch_corrupt_pious = { 
					remove_country_modifier = patriarch_corrupt_pious
				}
				patriarch_corrupt_fanatical = { 
					remove_country_modifier = patriarch_corrupt_fanatical
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = patriarch_hostile
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					patriarch_authority = 0.75
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_country_modifier = patriarch_hostile_fanatical
						}
					}
					trigger_switch = { 
						on_trigger = has_country_modifier
						patriarch_hostile_observant = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_hostile_observant
						}
						patriarch_hostile_pious = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_hostile_pious
						}
					}
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = patriarch_hostile_fanatical
						duration = -1
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					patriarch_authority = 0.50
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_country_modifier = patriarch_hostile_pious
						}
					}
					trigger_switch = { 
						on_trigger = has_country_modifier
						patriarch_hostile_observant = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_hostile_observant
						}
						patriarch_hostile_fanatical = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_hostile_fanatical
						}
					}
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = patriarch_hostile_pious
						duration = -1
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					patriarch_authority = 0.10
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_country_modifier = patriarch_hostile_observant
						}
					}
					trigger_switch = { 
						on_trigger = has_country_modifier
						patriarch_hostile_pious = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_hostile_pious
						}
						patriarch_hostile_fanatical = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_hostile_fanatical
						}
					}
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = patriarch_hostile_observant
						duration = -1
					}
				}
			}
			else = { 
				trigger_switch = { 
					on_trigger = has_country_modifier
					patriarch_hostile_observant = { 
						remove_country_modifier = patriarch_hostile_observant
					}
					patriarch_hostile_pious = { 
						remove_country_modifier = patriarch_hostile_pious
					}
					patriarch_hostile_fanatical = { 
						remove_country_modifier = patriarch_hostile_fanatical
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			trigger_switch = { 
				on_trigger = has_country_modifier
				patriarch_hostile_observant = { 
					remove_country_modifier = patriarch_hostile_observant
				}
				patriarch_hostile_pious = { 
					remove_country_modifier = patriarch_hostile_pious
				}
				patriarch_hostile_fanatical = { 
					remove_country_modifier = patriarch_hostile_fanatical
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Zoroastrian.047
	title = DG_Zoroastrian.047.t
	desc = DG_Zoroastrian.047.d
	picture = zoroastrian_religion
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = zoroastrian_priesthood_reestablished
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						has_country_modifier = caste_system_relaxed
					}
					NOT = { 
						has_country_modifier = caste_system_loose
					}
				}
				custom_tooltip = DG_Zoroastrian.047.d_2
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					OR = { 
						has_country_modifier = caste_system_relaxed
						has_country_modifier = caste_system_loose
					}
				}
				custom_tooltip = DG_Zoroastrian.047.d_3
			}
		}
		else = { 
			custom_tooltip = DG_Zoroastrian.047.d_1
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.047.accept
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 20
		}
		add_country_modifier = { 
			name = preacher_shortage
			duration = 5000
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.047.lower_standards
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 30
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				piety = 0.20
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				piety = 0.60
				factor = 0.5
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_prestige = -5
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_prestige = -4
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_prestige = -3
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_prestige = -2
		}
		else = { 
			add_prestige = -1
		}
		add_piety = -0.20
		add_country_modifier = { 
			name = impious_priests
			duration = 5000
			hidden = yes
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.047.dastur
		trigger = { 
			OR = { 
				has_country_modifier = caste_system_relaxed
				has_country_modifier = caste_system_loose
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 50
		}
		add_adm_power = -5
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Zoroastrian.049
	title = DG_Zoroastrian.049.t
	desc = DG_Zoroastrian.049.d
	picture = zoroastrian_religion
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		set_ruler_flag = zoroastrian_dreams_interpreted
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = bad_dream
			}
			custom_tooltip = DG_Zoroastrian.049.bad_dream
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = good_dream
			}
			custom_tooltip = DG_Zoroastrian.049.good_dream
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = good_dream
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = bad_dream
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = DG_Zoroastrian.049.neutral_dream
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = good_dream
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = bad_dream
				}
				has_ruler_flag = zoroastrian_dreams
			}
			custom_tooltip = DG_Zoroastrian.049.silly_dream
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.049.public
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = bad_dream
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 25
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = good_dream
				}
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					DIP = 3
				}
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				DIP = 5
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				DIP = 4
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		add_dip_power = -10
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = good_dream
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					DIP = 5
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						piety = 0.60
					}
					add_legitimacy = 2.5
					add_devotion = 5
					add_republican_tradition = 1.25
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						piety = 0.20
					}
					add_legitimacy = 2
					add_devotion = 4
					add_republican_tradition = 1
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						piety = -0.20
					}
					add_legitimacy = 1.5
					add_devotion = 3
					add_republican_tradition = 0.75
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						piety = -0.60
					}
					add_legitimacy = 1
					add_devotion = 2
					add_republican_tradition = 0.5
				}
				else = { 
					add_legitimacy = 0.5
					add_devotion = 1
					add_republican_tradition = 0.25
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						piety = 0.60
					}
					add_prestige = 5
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						piety = 0.20
					}
					add_prestige = 4
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						piety = -0.20
					}
					add_prestige = 3
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						piety = -0.60

				else = {

				}
			}

				}
