			if = { 
				limit = { 
					DIP = 5
				}
				random = { 
					chance = 50
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = 0.60
						}
						add_legitimacy = 2.5
						add_devotion = 5
						add_republican_tradition = 1.25
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = 0.20
						}
						add_legitimacy = 2
						add_devotion = 4
						add_republican_tradition = 1
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = -0.20
						}
						add_legitimacy = 1.5
						add_devotion = 3
						add_republican_tradition = 0.75
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = -0.60
						}
						add_legitimacy = 1
						add_devotion = 2
						add_republican_tradition = 0.5
					}
					else = { 
						add_legitimacy = 0.5
						add_devotion = 1
						add_republican_tradition = 0.25
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = 0.60
						}
						add_prestige = 5
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = 0.20
						}
						add_prestige = 4
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = -0.20
						}
						add_prestige = 3
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = -0.60
						}
						add_prestige = 2
					}
					else = { 
						add_prestige = 1
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					DIP = 4
				}
				random = { 
					chance = 40
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = 0.60
						}
						add_legitimacy = 2.5
						add_devotion = 5
						add_republican_tradition = 1.25
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = 0.20
						}
						add_legitimacy = 2
						add_devotion = 4
						add_republican_tradition = 1
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = -0.20
						}
						add_legitimacy = 1.5
						add_devotion = 3
						add_republican_tradition = 0.75
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = -0.60
						}
						add_legitimacy = 1
						add_devotion = 2
						add_republican_tradition = 0.5
					}
					else = { 
						add_legitimacy = 0.5
						add_devotion = 1
						add_republican_tradition = 0.25
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = 0.60
						}
						add_prestige = 5
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = 0.20
						}
						add_prestige = 4
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = -0.20
						}
						add_prestige = 3
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = -0.60
						}
						add_prestige = 2
					}
					else = { 
						add_prestige = 1
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					DIP = 3
				}
				random = { 
					chance = 30
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = 0.60
						}
						add_legitimacy = 2.5
						add_devotion = 5
						add_republican_tradition = 1.25
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = 0.20
						}
						add_legitimacy = 2
						add_devotion = 4
						add_republican_tradition = 1
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = -0.20
						}
						add_legitimacy = 1.5
						add_devotion = 3
						add_republican_tradition = 0.75
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = -0.60
						}
						add_legitimacy = 1
						add_devotion = 2
						add_republican_tradition = 0.5
					}
					else = { 
						add_legitimacy = 0.5
						add_devotion = 1
						add_republican_tradition = 0.25
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = 0.60
						}
						add_prestige = 5
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = 0.20
						}
						add_prestige = 4
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = -0.20
						}
						add_prestige = 3
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = -0.60
						}
						add_prestige = 2
					}
					else = { 
						add_prestige = 1
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					DIP = 2
				}
				random = { 
					chance = 20
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = 0.60
						}
						add_legitimacy = 2.5
						add_devotion = 5
						add_republican_tradition = 1.25
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = 0.20
						}
						add_legitimacy = 2
						add_devotion = 4
						add_republican_tradition = 1
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = -0.20
						}
						add_legitimacy = 1.5
						add_devotion = 3
						add_republican_tradition = 0.75
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = -0.60
						}
						add_legitimacy = 1
						add_devotion = 2
						add_republican_tradition = 0.5
					}
					else = { 
						add_legitimacy = 0.5
						add_devotion = 1
						add_republican_tradition = 0.25
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = 0.60
						}
						add_prestige = 5
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = 0.20
						}
						add_prestige = 4
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = -0.20
						}
						add_prestige = 3
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = -0.60
						}
						add_prestige = 2
					}
					else = { 
						add_prestige = 1
					}
				}
			}
			else = { 
				random = { 
					chance = 10
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = 0.60
						}
						add_legitimacy = 2.5
						add_devotion = 5
						add_republican_tradition = 1.25
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = 0.20
						}
						add_legitimacy = 2
						add_devotion = 4
						add_republican_tradition = 1
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = -0.20
						}
						add_legitimacy = 1.5
						add_devotion = 3
						add_republican_tradition = 0.75
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = -0.60
						}
						add_legitimacy = 1
						add_devotion = 2
						add_republican_tradition = 0.5
					}
					else = { 
						add_legitimacy = 0.5
						add_devotion = 1
						add_republican_tradition = 0.25
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = 0.60
						}
						add_prestige = 5
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = 0.20
						}
						add_prestige = 4
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = -0.20
						}
						add_prestige = 3
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							piety = -0.60
						}
						add_prestige = 2
					}
					else = { 
						add_prestige = 1
					}
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						has_country_flag = good_dream
					}
					NOT = { 
						has_country_flag = bad_dream
					}
				}
				set_ruler_flag = zoroastrian_dreams
			}
			clr_country_flag = bad_dream
			clr_country_flag = good_dream
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.049.private
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 25
			modifier = { 
				has_country_flag = good_dream
				factor = 0.25
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = good_dream
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = bad_dream
				}
			}
			set_ruler_flag = zoroastrian_dreams
		}
		clr_country_flag = bad_dream
		clr_country_flag = good_dream
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.049.repent
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = good_dream
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 25
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = good_dream
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = bad_dream
				}
			}
			set_ruler_flag = zoroastrian_dreams
		}
		set_ruler_flag = zoroastrian_purification_ritual
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_legitimacy = 5
			add_devotion = 10
			add_republican_tradition = 2.5
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_legitimacy = 4
			add_devotion = 8
			add_republican_tradition = 2
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_legitimacy = 3
			add_devotion = 6
			add_republican_tradition = 1.5
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_legitimacy = 2
			add_devotion = 4
			add_republican_tradition = 1
		}
		else = { 
			add_legitimacy = 1
			add_devotion = 2
			add_republican_tradition = 0.5
		}
		add_prestige = -2
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				monthly_income = 6.7
			}
			add_years_of_income = -0.05
		}
		else = { 
			add_treasury = -4
		}
		clr_country_flag = bad_dream
		clr_country_flag = good_dream
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.049.personal
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = ruler_fanatical
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 25
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = good_dream
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = bad_dream
				}
			}
			set_ruler_flag = zoroastrian_dreams
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = ruler_fanatical
				}
			}
			add_piety = 0.10
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = ruler_pious
			}
			clr_country_flag = ruler_pious
			set_country_flag = ruler_fanatical
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = ruler_observant
			}
			clr_country_flag = ruler_observant
			set_country_flag = ruler_pious
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = ruler_cynical
			}
			clr_country_flag = ruler_cynical
			set_country_flag = ruler_observant
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = ruler_unbeliever
			}
			clr_country_flag = ruler_unbeliever
			set_country_flag = ruler_cynical
		}
		clr_country_flag = bad_dream
		clr_country_flag = good_dream
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Zoroastrian.050
	title = DG_Zoroastrian.050.t
	desc = DG_Zoroastrian.050.d
	picture = zoroastrian_religion
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		set_ruler_flag = zoroastrian_purification_ritual
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.050.accept
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 50
			modifier = { 
				government = monarchy
				NOT = { 
					legitimacy = 90
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				government = monarchy
				NOT = { 
					legitimacy = 80
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				government = monarchy
				NOT = { 
					legitimacy = 70
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				government = monarchy
				NOT = { 
					legitimacy = 60
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				government = republic
				NOT = { 
					republican_tradition = 90
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				government = republic
				NOT = { 
					republican_tradition = 80
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				government = republic
				NOT = { 
					republican_tradition = 70
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				government = republic
				NOT = { 
					republican_tradition = 60
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				government = theocracy
				NOT = { 
					devotion = 90
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				government = theocracy
				NOT = { 
					devotion = 80
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				government = theocracy
				NOT = { 
					devotion = 70
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				government = theocracy
				NOT = { 
					devotion = 60
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				has_country_flag = ruler_piety_fanatical
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				has_country_flag = ruler_piety_pious
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_legitimacy = 5
			add_devotion = 10
			add_republican_tradition = 2.5
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_legitimacy = 4
			add_devotion = 8
			add_republican_tradition = 2
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_legitimacy = 3
			add_devotion = 6
			add_republican_tradition = 1.5
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_legitimacy = 2
			add_devotion = 4
			add_republican_tradition = 1
		}
		else = { 
			add_legitimacy = 1
			add_devotion = 2
			add_republican_tradition = 0.5
		}
		add_prestige = -2
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				monthly_income = 6.7
			}
			add_years_of_income = -0.05
		}
		else = { 
			add_treasury = -4
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.050.refuse
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 50
			modifier = { 
				has_country_flag = ruler_piety_unbeliever
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				has_country_flag = ruler_piety_cynical
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				num_of_loans = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				num_of_loans = 3
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					years_of_income = 0.02
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					years_of_income = 0.08
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		add_prestige = 2
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Zoroastrian.061
	title = DG_Zoroastrian.061.t
	desc = DG_Zoroastrian.061.d
	picture = zoroastrian_religion
	trigger = { 
		ai = no
		AND = { 
			culture_group = persian_group
		}
		check_variable = { 
			which = pms
			value = 10
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_global_flag = zoroastrian_sassanid_gambit
		}
		OR = { 
			NOT = { 
				stability = 1
			}
			num_of_revolts = 1
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy = 90
			}
		}
		NOT = { 
			religion = zoroastrian
		}
		NOT = { 
			government = theocracy
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		years = 20
	}
	immediate = { 
		set_global_flag = zoroastrian_sassanid_gambit
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.061.no
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 100
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.061.yes
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
		every_owned_province = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					culture_group = persian_group
				}
				religion = zoroastrian
				NOT = { 
					is_core = owner
				}
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						continent = southeast_asia
						continent = indian_continent
						continent = asia
						continent = central_asia
						continent = north_asia
					}
				}
			}
			add_core = owner
		}
		set_country_flag = voluntary_conversion
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					is_religion_enabled = zoroastrian
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = convert_dangerous_religion
			hidden_effect = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							stability = -2
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ahf
						value = 0
					}
				}
				else = { 
					add_stability = -1
				}
			}
			tooltip = { 
				add_stability = -1
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_emperor_of_china = yes
				}
				add_mandate = -5
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_emperor_of_china = yes
				}
				add_mandate = -5
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = pms
					value = 75
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = convert_population_75
			hidden_effect = { 
				change_variable = { 
					which = ahf
					value = 600
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 1200
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							stability = 3
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 1200
						}
					}
					else = { 
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 1200
						}
						add_stability = 1
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								stability = -2
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 0
						}
					}
					else = { 
						change_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 1200
						}
						add_stability = -1
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ahd
					which = ahf
				}
				divide_variable = { 
					which = ahd
					value = 12
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = ahd
					value = 0.1
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = ahd
					value = 10
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = lsc
					value = 100
				}
				subtract_variable = { 
					which = lsc
					which = ahd
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = POP_StabAdd50
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_emperor_of_china = yes
				}
				add_mandate = 2.5
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = pms
					value = 50
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = convert_population_50
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = pms
					value = 25
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = convert_population_25
			hidden_effect = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							stability = -2
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ahf
						value = 0
					}
				}
				else = { 
					add_stability = -1
				}
			}
			tooltip = { 
				add_stability = -1
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_emperor_of_china = yes
				}
				add_mandate = -5
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_emperor_of_china = yes
				}
				add_mandate = -5
			}
		}
		else = { 
			custom_tooltip = convert_population_0
			hidden_effect = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							stability = -2
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ahf
						value = 0
					}
				}
				else = { 
					add_stability = -2
				}
			}
			tooltip = { 
				add_stability = -2
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_emperor_of_china = yes
				}
				add_mandate = -10
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				patriarch_authority = 0.75
			}
			custom_tooltip = convert_church_strong
			hidden_effect = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							stability = -2
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ahf
						value = 0
					}
				}
				else = { 
					add_stability = -2
				}
			}
			tooltip = { 
				add_stability = -2
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_emperor_of_china = yes
				}
				add_mandate = -10
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				patriarch_authority = 0.50
			}
			custom_tooltip = convert_piety_moderate
			hidden_effect = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							stability = -2
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ahf
						value = 0
					}
				}
				else = { 
					add_stability = -1
				}
			}
			tooltip = { 
				add_stability = -1
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_emperor_of_china = yes
				}
				add_mandate = -5
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_emperor_of_china = yes
				}
				add_mandate = -5
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				patriarch_authority = 0.25
			}
			custom_tooltip = convert_church_weak
		}
		else = { 
			custom_tooltip = convert_church_insignificant
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				ADM = 5
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					capital_scope = { 
						religion = zoroastrian
					}
				}
				custom_tooltip = convert_ruler_strong
				hidden_effect = { 
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							stability = 3
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 1200
						}
					}
					else = { 
						add_stability = 2
					}
				}
				tooltip = { 
					add_stability = 2
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_emperor_of_china = yes
					}
					add_mandate = 10
				}
			}
			else = { 
				custom_tooltip = convert_ruler_moderate
				hidden_effect = { 
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							stability = 3
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 1200
						}
					}
					else = { 
						add_stability = 1
					}
				}
				tooltip = { 
					add_stability = 1
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_emperor_of_china = yes
					}
					add_mandate = 5
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				ADM = 3
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					capital_scope = { 
						religion = zoroastrian
					}
				}
				custom_tooltip = convert_ruler_moderate
				hidden_effect = { 
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							stability = 3
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 1200
						}
					}
					else = { 
						add_stability = 1
					}
				}
				tooltip = { 
					add_stability = 1
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_emperor_of_china = yes
					}
					add_mandate = 5
				}
			}
			else = { 
				custom_tooltip = convert_ruler_weak
				hidden_effect = { 
					change_variable = { 
						which = ahf
						value = 600
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								stability = 3
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
						}
						else = { 
							subtract_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
							add_stability = 1
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ahf
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									stability = -2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 0
							}
						}
						else = { 
							change_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
							add_stability = -1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						which = ahf
					}
					divide_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 12
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 0.1
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 10
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = lsc
						value = 100
					}
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = lsc
						which = ahd
					}
				}
				custom_tooltip = POP_StabAdd50
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_emperor_of_china = yes
					}
					add_mandate = 2.5
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					capital_scope = { 
						religion = zoroastrian
					}
				}
				custom_tooltip = convert_ruler_weak
				hidden_effect = { 
					change_variable = { 
						which = ahf
						value = 600
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								stability = 3
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
						}
						else = { 
							subtract_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
							add_stability = 1
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ahf
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									stability = -2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 0
							}
						}
						else = { 
							change_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
							add_stability = -1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						which = ahf
					}
					divide_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 12
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 0.1
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 10
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = lsc
						value = 100
					}
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = lsc
						which = ahd
					}
				}
				custom_tooltip = POP_StabAdd50
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_emperor_of_china = yes
					}
					add_mandate = 2.5
				}
			}
			else = { 
				custom_tooltip = convert_ruler_incompetent
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				advisor = theologian
			}
			custom_tooltip = convert_theologian
			hidden_effect = { 
				change_variable = { 
					which = ahf
					value = 600
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 1200
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							stability = 3
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 1200
						}
					}
					else = { 
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 1200
						}
						add_stability = 1
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								stability = -2
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 0
						}
					}
					else = { 
						change_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 1200
						}
						add_stability = -1
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ahd
					which = ahf
				}
				divide_variable = { 
					which = ahd
					value = 12
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = ahd
					value = 0.1
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = ahd
					value = 10
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = lsc
					value = 100
				}
				subtract_variable = { 
					which = lsc
					which = ahd
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = POP_StabAdd50
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_emperor_of_china = yes
				}
				add_mandate = 2.5
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = was_zoroastrian
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = sympathy_to_old_religion
						value = 1
					}
				}
				custom_tooltip = convert_previous_recent
				hidden_effect = { 
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							stability = 3
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 1200
						}
					}
					else = { 
						add_stability = 1
					}
				}
				tooltip = { 
					add_stability = 1
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_emperor_of_china = yes
					}
					add_mandate = 5
				}
			}
			else = { 
				custom_tooltip = convert_previous_old
				hidden_effect = { 
					change_variable = { 
						which = ahf
						value = 600
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								stability = 3
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
						}
						else = { 
							subtract_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
							add_stability = 1
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ahf
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									stability = -2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 0
							}
						}
						else = { 
							change_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
							add_stability = -1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						which = ahf
					}
					divide_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 12
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 0.1
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 10
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = lsc
						value = 100
					}
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = lsc
						which = ahd
					}
				}
				custom_tooltip = POP_StabAdd50
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_emperor_of_china = yes
					}
					add_mandate = 2.5
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = sympathy_to_old_religion
						value = 1
					}
				}
				custom_tooltip = convert_recent
				hidden_effect = { 
					change_variable = { 
						which = ahf
						value = 600
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								stability = 3
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
						}
						else = { 
							subtract_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
							add_stability = 1
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ahf
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									stability = -2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 0
							}
						}
						else = { 
							change_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
							add_stability = -1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						which = ahf
					}
					divide_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 12
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 0.1
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 10
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = lsc
						value = 100
					}
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = lsc
						which = ahd
					}
				}
				custom_tooltip = POP_StabAdd50
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_emperor_of_china = yes
					}
					add_mandate = 2.5
				}
			}
		}
		change_religion = zoroastrian
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Zoroastrian.062
	title = DG_Zoroastrian.062.t
	desc = DG_Zoroastrian.062.d
	picture = zoroastrian_religion
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = { 
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_restored
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = zoroastrian_revival
		}
	}
	immediate = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					AND = { 
						culture_group = persian_group
					}
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = DG_Zoroastrian.062.return
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.062.only
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = zoroastrian_revival
			}
			NOT = { 
				any_known_country = { 
					religion = zoroastrian
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = zoroastrian_revival
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_prestige = 5
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_prestige = 4
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_prestige = 3
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_prestige = 2
		}
		else = { 
			add_prestige = 1
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					AND = { 
						culture_group = persian_group
					}
				}
			}
			every_province = { 
				limit = { 
					religion = zoroastrian
					AND = { 
						culture_group = persian_group
					}
					NOT = { 
						owned_by = ROOT
					}
					NOT = { 
						owner = { 
							overlord_of = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
				add_claim = ROOT
			}
		}
		every_known_country = { 
			limit = { 
				any_owned_province = { 
					OR = { 
						religion = zoroastrian
						check_variable = { 
							which = pms
							value = 20
						}
					}
				}
				NOT = { 
					religion = zoroastrian
				}
				NOT = { 
					zoroastrian = 2
				}
			}
			country_event = { 
				id = DG_Zoroastrian.063
				days = 30
				random = 180
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				event_target:zoroastrian_great_fire_priests = { 
					owner = { 
						NOT = { 
							religion = zoroastrian
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:zoroastrian_great_fire_priests = { 
				add_claim = ROOT
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				event_target:zoroastrian_great_fire_warriors = { 
					owner = { 
						NOT = { 
							religion = zoroastrian
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:zoroastrian_great_fire_warriors = { 
				add_claim = PREV
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				event_target:zoroastrian_great_fire_farmers = { 
					owner = { 
						NOT = { 
							religion = zoroastrian
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:zoroastrian_great_fire_farmers = { 
				add_claim = PREV
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.062.notonly
		trigger = { 
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = zoroastrian_revival
				any_known_country = { 
					religion = zoroastrian
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = zoroastrian_revival
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Zoroastrian.063
	title = DG_Zoroastrian.063.t
	desc = DG_Zoroastrian.063.d
	picture = zoroastrian_religion
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.063.harsh
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_happening
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 30
			modifier = { 
				is_at_war = yes
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = { 
				war_exhaustion = 4
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = { 
				war_exhaustion = 8
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = { 
				num_of_revolts = 1
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				any_owned_province = { 
					religion = zoroastrian
					unrest = 1
				}
				factor = 0.5
			}
		}
		add_war_exhaustion = 2
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = pms
					value = 45
				}
			}
			add_years_of_income = 0.50
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = pms
					value = 40
				}
			}
			add_years_of_income = 0.45
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = pms
					value = 35
				}
			}
			add_years_of_income = 0.40
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = pms
					value = 30
				}
			}
			add_years_of_income = 0.35
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = pms
					value = 25
				}
			}
			add_years_of_income = 0.30
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = pms
					value = 20
				}
			}
			add_years_of_income = 0.25
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = pms
					value = 15
				}
			}
			add_years_of_income = 0.20
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = pms
					value = 10
				}
			}
			add_years_of_income = 0.15
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = pms
					value = 5
				}
			}
			add_years_of_income = 0.10
		}
		else = { 
			add_years_of_income = 0.05
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
				}
			}
			add_piety = 0.20
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_intolerance
				duration = 1600
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_intolerance
				duration = 800
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_intolerance
				duration = 400
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = religious_turmoil_zoroastrian
		set_country_flag = religious_turmoil_happening
		if = { 
			limit = {

		hidden_effect = { 
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					OR = { 
						AND = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = adv
								value = 38
							}
							check_variable = { 
								which = ayr
								value = 20
							}
						}
						AND = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = adx
								value = 38
							}
							check_variable = { 
								which = ays
								value = 20
							}
						}
						AND = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = adz
								value = 38
							}
							check_variable = { 
								which = ayt
								value = 20
							}
						}
						AND = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = aeb
								value = 38
							}
							check_variable = { 
								which = ayu
								value = 20
							}
						}
						AND = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = aed
								value = 38
							}
							check_variable = { 
								which = ayv
								value = 20
							}
						}
						AND = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = aef
								value = 38
							}
							check_variable = { 
								which = ayw
								value = 20
							}
						}
					}
					controlled_by = owner
					is_city = yes
					NOT = { 
						has_province_modifier = religious_autonomy
					}
				}
				add_province_modifier = { 
					name = expulsion_of_heretics
					duration = 1500
				}
			}
		}
		every_known_country = { 
			limit = { 
				ai = no
				religion = zoroastrian
				NOT = { 
					border_distance = { 
						who = ROOT
						distance = 400
					}
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = religious_news_major
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.60
				}
				add_opinion = { 
					who = ROOT
					modifier = mistreated_coreligionists_fanatical
				}
				add_casus_belli = { 
					target = ROOT
					months = 48
					type = cb_holy_war_vengeance
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.20
				}
				add_opinion = { 
					who = ROOT
					modifier = mistreated_coreligionists_pious
				}
				add_casus_belli = { 
					target = ROOT
					months = 24
					type = cb_holy_war_vengeance
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				add_opinion = { 
					who = ROOT
					modifier = mistreated_coreligionists_observant
				}
				add_casus_belli = { 
					target = ROOT
					months = 12
					type = cb_holy_war_vengeance
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				add_opinion = { 
					who = ROOT
					modifier = mistreated_coreligionists_decadent
				}
			}
		}
		every_known_country = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					border_distance = { 
						who = ROOT
						distance = 400
					}
				}
				OR = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							ai = yes
							has_country_flag = religious_news_major
						}
						OR = { 
							religion = zoroastrian
							overlord_of = ROOT
							junior_union_with = ROOT
							senior_union_with = ROOT
							check_variable = { 
								which = pms
								value = 50
							}
							is_rival = ROOT
							is_enemy = ROOT
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							ai = yes
							has_country_flag = religious_news_trivial
						}
						OR = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = pms
								value = 25
							}
							alliance_with = ROOT
							marriage_with = ROOT
							dynasty = ROOT
							is_neighbor_of = ROOT
							truce_with = ROOT
							war_with = ROOT
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							ai = yes
							has_country_flag = religious_news_all
						}
						OR = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = pms
								value = 10
							}
							ai = no
						}
					}
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					border_distance = { 
						who = ROOT
						distance = 300
					}
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = dg_refugees.001
					days = 120
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					border_distance = { 
						who = ROOT
						distance = 200
					}
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = dg_refugees.001
					days = 90
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					border_distance = { 
						who = ROOT
						distance = 100
					}
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = dg_refugees.001
					days = 60
				}
			}
			else = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = dg_refugees.001
					days = 30
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.063.moderate
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 40
			modifier = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = pms
					value = 10
				}
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = pms
					value = 25
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = pms
					value = 50
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							stability = -2
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ahf
						value = 0
					}
				}
				else = { 
					add_stability = -2
				}
			}
			tooltip = { 
				add_stability = -2
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_emperor_of_china = yes
				}
				add_mandate = -10
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = pms
					value = 25
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							stability = -2
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ahf
						value = 0
					}
				}
				else = { 
					add_stability = -1
				}
			}
			tooltip = { 
				add_stability = -1
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_emperor_of_china = yes
				}
				add_mandate = -5
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_emperor_of_china = yes
				}
				add_mandate = -5
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = pms
					value = 10
				}
			}
			random = { 
				chance = 60
				hidden_effect = { 
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								stability = -2
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 0
						}
					}
					else = {

					}
					add_mandate = -5
				}
			}
		}
		else = {

				chance = 30
				hidden_effect = {

						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								stability = -2

							which = ahf
							value = 0

				if = { 
					limit = {

					}
					add_mandate = -5
				}
			}
		}

		}

							limit = {

									which = adx
									value = 1
								}

						value = 0

						which = aeh

						which = arf
						which = aej
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = ael
					}

							which = ael

						value = 0

					}

								}
							}

								which = aea

							}

									value = 1
								}
							}

							which = arf
							which = ady

							which = aea
						}

						}

							which = arf
							which = aee
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = aeg
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = {

									which = arf
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = adw
							which = arf
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = ady
							which = arf
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = aea
							which = arf
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = aec
							which = arf
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = aee
							which = arf
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = aeg
							which = arf
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						value = 0
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			change_variable = { 
				which = zoroastrian_nasks
				value = 2
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Zoroastrian.066
	title = DG_Zoroastrian.066.t
	desc = DG_Zoroastrian.066.d
	picture = zoroastrian_religion
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		set_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_polytheism
		hidden_effect = { 
			change_variable = { 
				which = zoroastrian_nasks
				value = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.065.purify
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 30
			modifier = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = zoroastrian_avestas_restorationist
					value = 1
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = zoroastrian_avestas_restorationist
					value = 2
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				any_known_country = { 
					has_country_modifier = restorationist_zoroastrianism
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				overlord = { 
					has_country_modifier = restorationist_zoroastrianism
				}
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_polytheism_expurged
		add_country_modifier = { 
			name = zoroastrian_avestas_restorationist_reform
			duration = 5000
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			change_variable = { 
				which = zoroastrian_avestas_restorationist
				value = 1
			}
			change_variable = { 
				which = zoroastrian_avestas_traditionalist
				value = 0.25
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_islam
					has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_philosophy
					has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_polytheism

				}
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Zoroastrian.069
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.065.modify

					has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_language
				}

				}
			}
		}

			chance = 50

							which = adv
							value = 67
						}

						}
					}
					else_if = {

							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aed
							value = 67
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = aef
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aef

					}

						}

					set_variable = {

				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = adv
							value = 1
						}
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = aeh
								value = 0.01
							}
							check_variable = {

							}

							}

					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = aeh
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = aej
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = ael
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = aen
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = aep
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = aer
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = arf
								value = 0
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = {

				value = 2
			}

country_event = { 
	id = DG_Zoroastrian.067
	title = DG_Zoroastrian.067.t
	desc = DG_Zoroastrian.067.d
	picture = zoroastrian_religion
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		set_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_philosophy
		hidden_effect = { 
			change_variable = { 
				which = zoroastrian_nasks
				value = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.067.purify
		ai_chance = {

			}

				limit = {

						divide_variable = { 
							which = aej
							which = arf
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = ael
							which = arf
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = aen
							which = arf
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = aep
							which = arf
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = aer
							which = arf
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = aei
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = aek
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = aem
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = aeo
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = aeq
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = aes
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = arf
								value = 0
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = adv
									value = 1
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = aei
								value = 1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = adx
									value = 1
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = aek
								value = 1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = adz
									value = 1
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = aem
								value = 1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aeb
									value = 1
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = aeo
								value = 1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aed
									value = 1
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = aeq
								value = 1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aef
									value = 1
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = aes
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = aei
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = aek
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = aem
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = aeo
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = aeq
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = aes
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = arf
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = aei
							which = arf
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = aek
							which = arf
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = aem
							which = arf
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = aeo
							which = arf
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = aeq
							which = arf
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = aes
							which = arf
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = adw
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = ady
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = aea
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = aec
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = aee
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = aeg
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = arf
								value = 0
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = adv
									value = 1
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = adw
								value = 1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = adx
									value = 1
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ady
								value = 1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = adz
									value = 1
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = aea
								value = 1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aeb
									value = 1
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = aec
								value = 1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aed
									value = 1
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = aee
								value = 1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aef
									value = 1
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = aeg
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = adw
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = ady
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = aea
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = aec
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = aee
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = aeg
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = arf
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = adw
							which = arf
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = ady
							which = arf
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = aea
							which = arf
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = aec
							which = arf
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = aee
							which = arf
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = aeg
							which = arf
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						value = 0
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			change_variable = { 
				which = zoroastrian_nasks
				value = 2
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Zoroastrian.068
	title = DG_Zoroastrian.068.t
	desc = DG_Zoroastrian.068.d
	picture = zoroastrian_religion
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		set_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_language
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.068.original
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 30
			modifier = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = zoroastrian_avestas_restorationist
					value = 1
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = zoroastrian_avestas_restorationist
					value = 2
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				any_known_country = { 
					has_country_modifier = restorationist_zoroastrianism
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				overlord = { 
					has_country_modifier = restorationist_zoroastrianism
				}
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_original_languages
		add_country_modifier = { 
			name = zoroastrian_avestas_restorationist_reform
			duration = 5000
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			change_variable = { 
				which = zoroastrian_avestas_restorationist
				value = 1
			}
			change_variable = { 
				which = zoroastrian_avestas_traditionalist
				value = 0.25
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_islam
					has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_philosophy
					has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_polytheism
					has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_language
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Zoroastrian.069
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.068.both
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 40
			modifier = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = zoroastrian_avestas_traditionalist
					value = 1
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = zoroastrian_avestas_traditionalist
					value = 2
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				any_known_country = { 
					has_country_modifier = traditionalist_zoroastrianism
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				overlord = { 
					has_country_modifier = traditionalist_zoroastrianism
				}
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_modern_commentary
		add_country_modifier = { 
			name = zoroastrian_avestas_traditionalist_reform
			duration = 5000
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			change_variable = { 
				which = zoroastrian_avestas_traditionalist
				value = 1
			}
			change_variable = { 
				which = zoroastrian_avestas_restorationist
				value = 0.25
			}
			change_variable = { 
				which = zoroastrian_avestas_progressive
				value = 0.25
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_islam
					has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_philosophy
					has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_polytheism
					has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_language
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Zoroastrian.069
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.068.arabic
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 30
			modifier = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = zoroastrian_avestas_progressive
					value = 1
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = zoroastrian_avestas_progressive
					value = 2
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				any_known_country = { 
					has_country_modifier = progressive_zoroastrianism
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				overlord = { 
					has_country_modifier = progressive_zoroastrianism
				}
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_modern_scripture
		add_country_modifier = { 
			name = zoroastrian_avestas_progressive_reform
			duration = 5000
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			change_variable = { 
				which = zoroastrian_avestas_progressive
				value = 1
			}
			change_variable = { 
				which = zoroastrian_avestas_traditionalist
				value = 0.25
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_islam
					has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_philosophy
					has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_polytheism
					has_country_flag = zoroastrian_avestas_language
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Zoroastrian.069
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Zoroastrian.069
	title = DG_Zoroastrian.069.t
	desc = DG_Zoroastrian.069.d
	picture = zoroastrian_religion
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		set_country_flag = zoroastrianism_reformed
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = zoroastrian_avestas_traditionalist
					which = zoroastrian_avestas_restorationist
				}
				check_variable = { 
					which = zoroastrian_avestas_traditionalist
					which = zoroastrian_avestas_progressive
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = traditionalist_zoroastrianism
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					NOT = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = zoroastrian_avestas_traditionalist
							which = zoroastrian_avestas_restorationist
						}
					}
					NOT = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = zoroastrian_avestas_traditionalist
							which = zoroastrian_avestas_progressive
						}
					}
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = zoroastrian_avestas_restorationist
						which = zoroastrian_avestas_progressive
					}
				}
				set_country_flag = restorationist_zoroastrianism
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = zoroastrian_avestas_restorationist
							which = zoroastrian_avestas_progressive
						}
					}
				}
				set_country_flag = progressive_zoroastrianism
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			set_variable = { 
				which = zoroastrian_avestas_restorationist
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = zoroastrian_avestas_traditionalist
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = zoroastrian_avestas_progressive
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.069.a
		remove_country_modifier = fragmented_scriptures
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_prestige = 15
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_prestige = 12
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_prestige = 9
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_prestige = 6
		}
		else = { 
			add_prestige = 3
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = traditionalist_zoroastrianism
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = traditionalist_zoroastrianism
				duration = -1
			}
			every_country = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_modifier = traditionalist_zoroastrianism
					NOT = { 
						tag = ROOT
					}
					religion = zoroastrian
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						piety = 0.6
					}
					add_opinion = { 
						who = ROOT
						modifier = same_doctrine_fanatical
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						piety = 0.2
					}
					add_opinion = { 
						who = ROOT
						modifier = same_doctrine_pious
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						piety = -0.2
					}
					add_opinion = { 
						who = ROOT
						modifier = same_doctrine_observant
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = progressive_zoroastrianism
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = progressive_zoroastrianism
				duration = -1
			}
			every_country = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_modifier = progressive_zoroastrianism
					NOT = { 
						tag = ROOT
					}
					religion = zoroastrian
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						piety = 0.6
					}
					add_opinion = { 
						who = ROOT
						modifier = same_doctrine_fanatical
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						piety = 0.2
					}
					add_opinion = { 
						who = ROOT
						modifier = same_doctrine_pious
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						piety = -0.2
					}
					add_opinion = { 
						who = ROOT
						modifier = same_doctrine_observant
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = restorationist_zoroastrianism
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = restorationist_zoroastrianism
				duration = -1
			}
			every_country = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_modifier = restorationist_zoroastrianism
					NOT = { 
						tag = ROOT
					}
					religion = zoroastrian
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						piety = 0.6
					}
					add_opinion = { 
						who = ROOT
						modifier = same_doctrine_fanatical
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						piety = 0.2
					}
					add_opinion = { 
						who = ROOT
						modifier = same_doctrine_pious
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						piety = -0.2
					}
					add_opinion = { 
						who = ROOT
						modifier = same_doctrine_observant
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Zoroastrian.071
	title = DG_Zoroastrian.071.t
	desc = DG_Zoroastrian.071.d
	picture = zoroastrian_religion
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		set_country_flag = zoroastrian_brethren_mission
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					culture_group = persian_group
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = DG_Zoroastrian.071.d_persian
		}
		else = { 
			custom_tooltip = DG_Zoroastrian.071.d_parsi
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.071.support
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 50
			modifier = { 
				num_of_loans = 1
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = { 
				num_of_loans = 2
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = { 
				num_of_loans = 3
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = { 
				num_of_loans = 4
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					years_of_income = 0.08
				}
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					years_of_income = 0.16
				}
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				years_of_income = 0.50
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				years_of_income = 1
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				government = monarchy
				NOT = { 
					legitimacy = 90
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				government = monarchy
				NOT = { 
					legitimacy = 80
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				government = monarchy
				NOT = { 
					legitimacy = 70
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				government = monarchy
				NOT = { 
					legitimacy = 60
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				government = republic
				NOT = { 
					republican_tradition = 90
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				government = republic
				NOT = { 
					republican_tradition = 80
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				government = republic
				NOT = { 
					republican_tradition = 70
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				government = republic
				NOT = { 
					republican_tradition = 60
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				government = theocracy
				NOT = { 
					devotion = 90
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				government = theocracy
				NOT = { 
					devotion = 80
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				government = theocracy
				NOT = { 
					devotion = 70
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				government = theocracy
				NOT = { 
					devotion = 60
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		add_years_of_income = -0.04
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_legitimacy = 2.5
			add_devotion = 5
			add_republican_tradition = 1.25
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_legitimacy = 2
			add_devotion = 4
			add_republican_tradition = 1
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_legitimacy = 1.5
			add_devotion = 3
			add_republican_tradition = 0.75
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_legitimacy = 1
			add_devotion = 2
			add_republican_tradition = 0.5
		}
		else = { 
			add_legitimacy = 0.5
			add_devotion = 1
			add_republican_tradition = 0.25
		}
		set_country_flag = zoroastrian_mission_sponsored
		hidden_effect = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = DG_Zoroastrian.072
				days = 500
				random = 500
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.071.luck
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 50
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = DG_Zoroastrian.072
				days = 1000
				random = 1000
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Zoroastrian.072
	title = DG_Zoroastrian.072.t
	desc = DG_Zoroastrian.072.d
	picture = zoroastrian_religion
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		set_country_flag = zoroastrian_brethren_mission_returns
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					culture_group = persian_group
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = DG_Zoroastrian.072.d_persian
		}
		else = { 
			custom_tooltip = DG_Zoroastrian.072.d_parsi
		}
		custom_tooltip = DG_Zoroastrian.072.d_2
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.072.a
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = zoroastrian_mission_sponsored
			}
			add_adm_power = 20
			clr_country_flag = zoroastrian_mission_sponsored
		}
		else = { 
			add_adm_power = 10
		}
		add_country_modifier = { 
			name = religious_controversy
			duration = 1000
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Zoroastrian.073
	title = DG_Zoroastrian.073.t
	desc = DG_Zoroastrian.073.d
	picture = zoroastrian_religion
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.073.no
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 20
		}
		add_prestige = -1
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.073.rivayat
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				AND = { 
					culture_group = persian_group
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 30
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_legitimacy = 2.5
			add_devotion = 5
			add_republican_tradition = 1.25
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_legitimacy = 2
			add_devotion = 4
			add_republican_tradition = 1
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_legitimacy = 1.5
			add_devotion = 3
			add_republican_tradition = 0.75
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_legitimacy = 1
			add_devotion = 2
			add_republican_tradition = 0.5
		}
		else = { 
			add_legitimacy = 0.5
			add_devotion = 1
			add_republican_tradition = 0.25
		}
		set_country_flag = zoroastrian_debate_women
		set_country_flag = zoroastrian_rivayat_women
		hidden_effect = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = DG_Zoroastrian.731
				days = 365
				random = 365
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				any_owned_province = { 
					AND = { 
						culture_group = persian_group
					}
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					monthly_income = 8.4
				}
				add_years_of_income = -0.03
			}
			else = { 
				add_treasury = -3
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					any_owned_province = { 
						AND = { 
							culture_group = persian_group
						}
					}
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					monthly_income = 8.4
				}
				add_years_of_income = -0.06
			}
			else = { 
				add_treasury = -6
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.073.parsi
		trigger = { 
			AND = { 
				culture_group = persian_group
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 30
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_legitimacy = 2.5
			add_devotion = 5
			add_republican_tradition = 1.25
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_legitimacy = 2
			add_devotion = 4
			add_republican_tradition = 1
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_legitimacy = 1.5
			add_devotion = 3
			add_republican_tradition = 0.75
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_legitimacy = 1
			add_devotion = 2
			add_republican_tradition = 0.5
		}
		else = { 
			add_legitimacy = 0.5
			add_devotion = 1
			add_republican_tradition = 0.25
		}
		set_country_flag = zoroastrian_debate_women
		set_country_flag = zoroastrian_rivayat_women
		hidden_effect = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = DG_Zoroastrian.731
				days = 365
				random = 365
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					any_owned_province = { 
						AND = { 
							culture_group = persian_group
						}
					}
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					monthly_income = 8.4
				}
				add_years_of_income = -0.03
			}
			else = { 
				add_treasury = -3
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				any_owned_province = { 
					AND = { 
						culture_group = persian_group
					}
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					monthly_income = 8.4
				}
				add_years_of_income = -0.06
			}
			else = { 
				add_treasury = -6
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.073.reform
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 5
			modifier = { 
				AND = { 
					culture_group = persian_group
				}
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					AND = { 
						culture_group = persian_group
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					culture_group = persian_group
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = -10
				add_devotion = -20
				add_republican_tradition = -5
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = -8
				add_devotion = -16
				add_republican_tradition = -4
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = -6
				add_devotion = -12
				add_republican_tradition = -3
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = -4
				add_devotion = -8
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
			else = { 
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_devotion = -4
				add_republican_tradition = -1
			}
		}
		else = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = -5
				add_devotion = -10
				add_republican_tradition = -2.5
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = -4
				add_devotion = -8
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = -3
				add_devotion = -6
				add_republican_tradition = -1.5
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_devotion = -4
				add_republican_tradition = -1
			}
			else = { 
				add_legitimacy = -1
				add_devotion = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -0.5
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = zoroastrian_debate_women
		add_country_modifier = { 
			name = zoroastrian_female_priests
			duration = -1
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 2000
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 1600
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 1200
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 800
			}
		}
		else = { 
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 400
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.073.moderate
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 10
		}
		set_country_flag = zoroastrian_debate_women
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 2000
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 1600
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 1200
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 800
			}
		}
		else = { 
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 400
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					culture_group = persian_group
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = 5
				add_devotion = 10
				add_republican_tradition = 2.5
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = 4
				add_devotion = 8
				add_republican_tradition = 2
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = 3
				add_devotion = 6
				add_republican_tradition = 1.5
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = 2
				add_devotion = 4
				add_republican_tradition = 1
			}
			else = { 
				add_legitimacy = 1
				add_devotion = 2
				add_republican_tradition = 0.5
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.073.conservative
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 5
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					AND = { 
						culture_group = persian_group
					}
				}
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				AND = { 
					culture_group = persian_group
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					AND = { 
						culture_group = persian_group
					}
				}
				has_country_flag = zoroastrian_rivayat_women
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = zoroastrian_debate_women
		set_country_flag = zoroastrian_priests_male_only
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					AND = { 
						culture_group = persian_group
					}
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = 5
				add_devotion = 10
				add_republican_tradition = 2.5
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = 4
				add_devotion = 8
				add_republican_tradition = 2
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = 3
				add_devotion = 6
				add_republican_tradition = 1.5
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = 2
				add_devotion = 4
				add_republican_tradition = 1
			}
			else = { 
				add_legitimacy = 1
				add_devotion = 2
				add_republican_tradition = 0.5
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 2000
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 1600
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 1200
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_country_modifier = {

				duration = 800
			}
		}
		else = {

				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 400
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { 
	id = DG_Zoroastrian.731
	title = DG_Zoroastrian.731.t
	desc = DG_Zoroastrian.731.d
	picture = zoroastrian_religion
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					culture_group = persian_group
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = DG_Zoroastrian_rivayat_women_parsi
		}
		else = { 
			custom_tooltip = DG_Zoroastrian_rivayat_women_persian
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			change_variable = { 
				which = zoroastrian_rivayats
				value = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.073.reform
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 5
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					AND = { 
						culture_group = persian_group
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					AND = { 
						culture_group = persian_group
					}
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = -5
				add_devotion = -10
				add_republican_tradition = -2.5
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = -4
				add_devotion = -8
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = -3
				add_devotion = -6
				add_republican_tradition = -1.5
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_devotion = -4
				add_republican_tradition = -1
			}
			else = { 
				add_legitimacy = -1
				add_devotion = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -0.5
			}
		}
		add_country_modifier = { 
			name = zoroastrian_female_priests
			duration = -1
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.073.moderate
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 10
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					culture_group = persian_group
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = 5
				add_devotion = 10
				add_republican_tradition = 2.5
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = 4
				add_devotion = 8
				add_republican_tradition = 2
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = 3
				add_devotion = 6
				add_republican_tradition = 1.5
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = 2
				add_devotion = 4
				add_republican_tradition = 1
			}
			else = { 
				add_legitimacy = 1
				add_devotion = 2
				add_republican_tradition = 0.5
			}
		}
		else = { 
			define_advisor = { 
				religion = zoroastrian
				type = theologian
				female = yes
				discount = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.073.conservative
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 5
			modifier = { 
				AND = { 
					culture_group = persian_group
				}
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					culture_group = persian_group
				}
			}
			define_advisor = { 
				religion = zoroastrian
				type = theologian
				discount = yes
			}
		}
		else = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = 5
				add_devotion = 10
				add_republican_tradition = 2.5
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = 4
				add_devotion = 8
				add_republican_tradition = 2
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = 3
				add_devotion = 6
				add_republican_tradition = 1.5
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = 2
				add_devotion = 4
				add_republican_tradition = 1
			}
			else = { 
				add_legitimacy = 1
				add_devotion = 2
				add_republican_tradition = 0.5
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = DG_Zoroastrian.074
	title = DG_Zoroastrian.073.t
	desc = DG_Zoroastrian.074.d
	picture = zoroastrian_religion
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.073.no
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 20
		}
		add_prestige = -1
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.073.rivayat
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				AND = { 
					culture_group = persian_group
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 30
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_legitimacy = 2.5
			add_devotion = 5
			add_republican_tradition = 1.25
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_legitimacy = 2
			add_devotion = 4
			add_republican_tradition = 1
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_legitimacy = 1.5
			add_devotion = 3
			add_republican_tradition = 0.75
		}
		else_if = {

			add_devotion = 2
			add_republican_tradition = 0.5
		}
		else = {

			add_devotion = 1
			add_republican_tradition = 0.25
		}
		set_country_flag = zoroastrian_debate_women
		set_country_flag = zoroastrian_rivayat_women
		hidden_effect = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = DG_Zoroastrian.741
				days = 365
				random = 365
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				any_owned_province = { 
					AND = { 
						culture_group = persian_group
					}
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					monthly_income = 8.4
				}
				add_years_of_income = -0.03
			}
			else = { 
				add_treasury = -3
			}
		}
		else = {

		else = { 
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 400
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.074.loose
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				has_country_modifier = caste_system_loose
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 10
			modifier = { 
				has_country_modifier = caste_system_harsh
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				has_country_modifier = caste_system_loose
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_modifier = caste_system_harsh
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = -10
				add_devotion = -20
				add_republican_tradition = -5
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = -8
				add_devotion = -16
				add_republican_tradition = -4
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = -6
				add_devotion = -12
				add_republican_tradition = -3
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
