				add_devotion = -8
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
			else = { 
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_devotion = -4
				add_republican_tradition = -1
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_modifier = caste_system_strict
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = -5
				add_devotion = -10
				add_republican_tradition = -2.5
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = -4
				add_devotion = -8
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = -3
				add_devotion = -6
				add_republican_tradition = -1.5
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_devotion = -4
				add_republican_tradition = -1
			}
			else = { 
				add_legitimacy = -1
				add_devotion = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -0.5
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_modifier = caste_system_relaxed
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = 2.5
				add_devotion = 5
				add_republican_tradition = 1.25
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = 2
				add_devotion = 4
				add_republican_tradition = 1
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = 1.5
				add_devotion = 3
				add_republican_tradition = 0.75
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = 1
				add_devotion = 2
				add_republican_tradition = 0.5
			}
			else = { 
				add_legitimacy = 0.5
				add_devotion = 1
				add_republican_tradition = 0.25
			}
		}
		remove_country_modifier = caste_system_harsh
		remove_country_modifier = caste_system_strict
		remove_country_modifier = caste_system_relaxed
		add_country_modifier = { 
			name = caste_system_loose
			duration = -1
		}

			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 2000
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 1600
			}
		}

				duration = 800
			}
		}
		else = {

				duration = 400
			}
		}

		ai_chance = {

			else = { 
				add_legitimacy = -0.5
				add_devotion = -1
				add_republican_tradition = -0.25
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_modifier = caste_system_loose
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = 2.5
				add_devotion = 5
				add_republican_tradition = 1.25
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = 2
				add_devotion = 4
				add_republican_tradition = 1
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = 1.5
				add_devotion = 3
				add_republican_tradition = 0.75
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = 1
				add_devotion = 2

			}
			else = { 
				add_legitimacy = 0.5
				add_devotion = 1
				add_republican_tradition = 0.25
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_modifier = caste_system_relaxed
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = 5
				add_devotion = 10
				add_republican_tradition = 2.5
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = 4
				add_devotion = 8
				add_republican_tradition = 2
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = 3
				add_devotion = 6
				add_republican_tradition = 1.5
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = 2
				add_devotion = 4
				add_republican_tradition = 1
			}
			else = { 
				add_legitimacy = 1
				add_devotion = 2
				add_republican_tradition = 0.5
			}
		}
		remove_country_modifier = caste_system_harsh
		remove_country_modifier = caste_system_loose
		remove_country_modifier = caste_system_relaxed
	}

		name = DG_Zoroastrian.074.loose_norm

		}

			else_if = {

			else = {

		name = DG_Zoroastrian.074.loose
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				has_country_modifier = caste_system_loose
			}
		}

					piety = 0.20

				add_legitimacy = 2
				add_devotion = 4
				add_republican_tradition = 1

			else_if = {

					piety = -0.20

				add_legitimacy = 1
				add_devotion = 2
				add_republican_tradition = 0.5

			else = {

		remove_country_modifier = caste_system_strict
		remove_country_modifier = caste_system_relaxed
		add_country_modifier = { 
			name = caste_system_loose
			duration = -1
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					culture_group = persian_group
				}
			}
			define_advisor = { 
				religion = zoroastrian
				type = theologian
				discount = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.074.relaxed
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 10
			modifier = { 
				has_country_modifier = caste_system_harsh
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = { 
				has_country_modifier = caste_system_relaxed
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		add_adm_power = -50
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_prestige = -15
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20

			add_prestige = -12
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_prestige = -9
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_prestige = -6
		}
		else = { 
			add_prestige = -3
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_modifier = caste_system_harsh
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = -10
				add_devotion = -20
				add_republican_tradition = -5
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = -8
				add_devotion = -16
				add_republican_tradition = -4
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = -6
				add_devotion = -12
				add_republican_tradition = -3
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = -4
				add_devotion = -8
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
			else = { 
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_devotion = -4
				add_republican_tradition = -1
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_modifier = caste_system_strict
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = -5
				add_devotion = -10
				add_republican_tradition = -2.5
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = -4
				add_devotion = -8
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = -3
				add_devotion = -6
				add_republican_tradition = -1.5
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_devotion = -4
				add_republican_tradition = -1
			}
			else = { 
				add_legitimacy = -1
				add_devotion = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -0.5
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_modifier = caste_system_loose
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = -2.5
				add_devotion = -5
				add_republican_tradition = -1.25
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_devotion = -4
				add_republican_tradition = -1
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				add_legitimacy = -1.5
				add_devotion = -3
				add_republican_tradition = -0.75
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				add_legitimacy = -1
				add_devotion = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -0.5
			}
			else = { 
				add_legitimacy = -0.5
				add_devotion = -1
				add_republican_tradition = -0.25
			}
		}
		remove_country_modifier = caste_system_harsh
		remove_country_modifier = caste_system_strict
		remove_country_modifier = caste_system_loose
		add_country_modifier = { 
			name = caste_system_relaxed
			duration = -1
		}
	}

country_event = { 
	id = DG_Zoroastrian.075
	title = DG_Zoroastrian.073.t
	desc = DG_Zoroastrian.075.d
	picture = zoroastrian_religion
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.073.no
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 20
		}
		add_prestige = -1
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.073.rivayat
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				AND = { 
					culture_group = persian_group
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 30
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_legitimacy = 2.5
			add_devotion = 5
			add_republican_tradition = 1.25
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_legitimacy = 2
			add_devotion = 4
			add_republican_tradition = 1
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_legitimacy = 1.5
			add_devotion = 3
			add_republican_tradition = 0.75
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_legitimacy = 1
			add_devotion = 2
			add_republican_tradition = 0.5
		}
		else = { 
			add_legitimacy = 0.5
			add_devotion = 1
			add_republican_tradition = 0.25
		}
		set_country_flag = zoroastrian_debate_calendar
		set_country_flag = zoroastrian_rivayat_calendar
		hidden_effect = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = DG_Zoroastrian.751
				days = 365
				random = 365
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				any_owned_province = { 
					AND = { 
						culture_group = persian_group
					}
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					monthly_income = 8.4
				}
				add_years_of_income = -0.03
			}
			else = { 
				add_treasury = -3
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					any_owned_province = { 
						AND = { 
							culture_group = persian_group
						}
					}
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					monthly_income = 8.4
				}
				add_years_of_income = -0.06
			}
			else = {

			}
		}

		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 10
			modifier = { 
				AND = {

				}
				factor = 2
			}

				}
				factor = 0.5
			}
		}
		if = {

				add_prestige = 3

					piety = -0.60

					piety = 0.60
				}
				add_prestige = -5
			}
			else_if = {

					piety = 0.20
				}
				add_prestige = -4
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				add_prestige = -3
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				add_prestige = -2
			}
			else = { 
				add_prestige = -1
			}
		}
		every_known_country = { 
			limit = { 
				religion = zoroastrian
				AND = { 
					culture_group = persian_group
				}
				NOT = { 
					tag = ROOT
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { 
				who = ROOT
				modifier = same_aspect_fanatical
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 2000
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 1600
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 1200
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 800
			}
		}
		else = { 
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 400
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.075.royal
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 10
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					AND = { 
						culture_group = persian_group
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				AND = { 
					culture_group = persian_group
				}
				factor = 0.5
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					culture_group = persian_group
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.60
				}
				add_prestige = -5
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.20
				}
				add_prestige = -4
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				add_prestige = -3
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				add_prestige = -2
			}
			else = { 
				add_prestige = -1
			}
		}
		else = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.60
				}
				add_prestige = 5
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.20
				}
				add_prestige = 4
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				add_prestige = 3
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				add_prestige = 2
			}
			else = { 
				add_prestige = 1
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 2000
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 1600
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 1200
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 800
			}
		}
		else = { 
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 400
			}
		}
		every_known_country = { 
			limit = { 
				religion = zoroastrian
				NOT = { 
					AND = { 
						culture_group = persian_group
					}
				}
				NOT = { 
					tag = ROOT
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { 
				who = ROOT
				modifier = same_aspect_fanatical
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.075.seasonal
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 10
		}
		add_adm_power = -25
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_prestige = 15
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_prestige = 12
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_prestige = 9
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_prestige = 6
		}
		else = { 
			add_prestige = 3
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 2000
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 1600
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 1200
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 800
			}
		}
		else = { 
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 400
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Zoroastrian.751
	title = DG_Zoroastrian.731.t
	desc = DG_Zoroastrian.731.d
	picture = zoroastrian_religion
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					culture_group = persian_group
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = DG_Zoroastrian_rivayat_caste_parsi
		}
		else = { 
			custom_tooltip = DG_Zoroastrian_rivayat_caste_persian
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			change_variable = { 
				which = zoroastrian_rivayats
				value = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.075.old
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 20
			modifier = { 
				AND = { 
					culture_group = persian_group
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					AND = { 
						culture_group = persian_group
					}
				}
				factor = 0.5
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					culture_group = persian_group
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.60
				}
				add_prestige = 15
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.20
				}
				add_prestige = 12
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				add_prestige = 9
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				add_prestige = 6
			}
			else = { 
				add_prestige = 3
			}
		}
		every_known_country = { 
			limit = { 
				religion = zoroastrian
				NOT = { 
					tag = ROOT
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { 
				who = ROOT
				modifier = same_aspect_fanatical
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.075.royal
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 10
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					AND = { 
						culture_group = persian_group
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				AND = { 
					culture_group = persian_group
				}
				factor = 0.5
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					culture_group = persian_group
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.60
				}
				add_prestige = -5
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.20
				}
				add_prestige = -4
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				add_prestige = -3
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				add_prestige = -2
			}
			else = { 
				add_prestige = -1
			}
		}
		else = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.60
				}
				add_prestige = 5
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = 0.20
				}
				add_prestige = 4
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.20
				}
				add_prestige = 3
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					piety = -0.60
				}
				add_prestige = 2
			}
			else = { 
				add_prestige = 1
			}
		}
		every_known_country = { 
			limit = { 
				religion = zoroastrian
				NOT = { 
					AND = { 
						culture_group = persian_group
					}
				}
				NOT = { 
					tag = ROOT
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { 
				who = ROOT
				modifier = same_aspect_fanatical
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.075.seasonal
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 20
		}
		add_adm_power = -10
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_prestige = 25
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_prestige = 20
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_prestige = 15
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_prestige = 10
		}
		else = { 
			add_prestige = 5
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Zoroastrian.076
	title = DG_Zoroastrian.073.t
	desc = DG_Zoroastrian.076.d
	picture = zoroastrian_religion
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		set_country_flag = zoroastrian_debate_funerals
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.076.imperial
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 50
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					AND = { 
						culture_group = persian_group
					}
				}
				factor = 0.5
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_prestige = 25
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_prestige = 20
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_prestige = 15
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_prestige = 10
		}
		else = { 
			add_prestige = 5
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 2000
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 1600
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 1200
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 800
			}
		}
		else = { 
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 400
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				monthly_income = 4.2
			}
			add_years_of_income = -0.10
		}
		else = { 
			add_treasury = -5
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.076.interpretation
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 40
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					AND = { 
						culture_group = persian_group
					}
				}
				factor = 0.5
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_prestige = 15
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_prestige = 12
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_prestige = 9
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_prestige = 6
		}
		else = { 
			add_prestige = 3
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				monthly_income = 4.2
			}
			add_years_of_income = -0.10
		}
		else = { 
			add_treasury = -5
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.076.literal
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 10
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					AND = { 
						culture_group = persian_group
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				num_of_loans = 1
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				num_of_loans = 3
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_prestige = -25
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_prestige = -20
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_prestige = -15
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_prestige = -10
		}
		else = { 
			add_prestige = -5
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Zoroastrian.077
	title = DG_Zoroastrian.073.t
	desc = DG_Zoroastrian.077.d
	picture = zoroastrian_religion
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.073.no
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 20
		}
		add_prestige = -1
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.073.rivayat
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				AND = { 
					culture_group = persian_group
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 30
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_legitimacy = 2.5
			add_devotion = 5
			add_republican_tradition = 1.25
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_legitimacy = 2
			add_devotion = 4
			add_republican_tradition = 1
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_legitimacy = 1.5
			add_devotion = 3
			add_republican_tradition = 0.75
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_legitimacy = 1
			add_devotion = 2
			add_republican_tradition = 0.5
		}
		else = { 
			add_legitimacy = 0.5
			add_devotion = 1
			add_republican_tradition = 0.25
		}
		set_country_flag = zoroastrian_debate_women
		set_country_flag = zoroastrian_rivayat_women
		hidden_effect = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = DG_Zoroastrian.771
				days = 365
				random = 365
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				any_owned_province = { 
					AND = { 
						culture_group = persian_group
					}
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					monthly_income = 6.70
				}
				add_years_of_income = -0.05
			}
			else = { 
				add_treasury = -4
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					any_owned_province = { 
						AND = { 
							culture_group = persian_group
						}
					}
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					monthly_income = 6.70
				}
				add_years_of_income = -0.10
			}
			else = { 
				add_treasury = -8
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.073.parsi
		trigger = { 
			AND = { 
				culture_group = persian_group
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 30
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_legitimacy = 2.5
			add_devotion = 5
			add_republican_tradition = 1.25
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_legitimacy = 2
			add_devotion = 4
			add_republican_tradition = 1
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_legitimacy = 1.5
			add_devotion = 3
			add_republican_tradition = 0.75
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_legitimacy = 1
			add_devotion = 2
			add_republican_tradition = 0.5
		}
		else = { 
			add_legitimacy = 0.5
			add_devotion = 1
			add_republican_tradition = 0.25
		}
		set_country_flag = zoroastrian_debate_women
		set_country_flag = zoroastrian_rivayat_women
		hidden_effect = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = DG_Zoroastrian.771
				days = 365
				random = 365
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					any_owned_province = { 
						AND = { 
							culture_group = persian_group
						}
					}
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					monthly_income = 6.70
				}
				add_years_of_income = -0.05
			}
			else = { 
				add_treasury = -4
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				any_owned_province = { 
					AND = { 
						culture_group = persian_group
					}
				}

			}

				add_treasury = -8
			}
		}

			factor = 5
		}
		add_adm_power = -50
		add_country_modifier = { 
			name = zoroastrian_interfaith_marriage
			duration = -1
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 2000
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 1600
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 1200
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 800
			}
		}
		else = { 
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 400
			}
		}
		random = { 
			chance = 50
			custom_tooltip = patriarch_becomes_hostile
			clr_country_flag = patriarch_hostile
			set_country_flag = patriarch_controversial
			clr_country_flag = patriarch_zealous
			clr_country_flag = patriarch_obedient
			clr_country_flag = patriarch_theologian
			clr_country_flag = patriarch_corrupt
		}
	}
	option = {

		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 10
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 2000
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 1600
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 1200
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 800
			}
		}
		else = { 
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 400
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.077.ban
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 5
		}
		add_adm_power = -20
		add_country_modifier = { 
			name = zoroastrian_interfaith_ban
			duration = -1
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 2000
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 1600
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 1200
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 800
			}
		}
		else = { 
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_controversy
				duration = 400
			}
		}
	}

				has_country_flag = patriarch_zealous

					patriarch_authority = 0.75
				}

country_event = { 
	id = DG_Zoroastrian.771
	title = DG_Zoroastrian.731.t
	desc = DG_Zoroastrian.731.d
	picture = zoroastrian_religion
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		custom_tooltip = DG_Zoroastrian_rivayat_interfaith
		hidden_effect = { 
			change_variable = { 
				which = zoroastrian_rivayats
				value = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.077.allow
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 20
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = pms
						value = 50
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = pms
						value = 70
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		add_adm_power = -50
		add_country_modifier = { 
			name = zoroastrian_interfaith_marriage
			duration = -1
		}
		random = { 
			chance = 50
			custom_tooltip = patriarch_becomes_hostile
			clr_country_flag = patriarch_hostile
			set_country_flag = patriarch_controversial
			clr_country_flag = patriarch_zealous
			clr_country_flag = patriarch_obedient
			clr_country_flag = patriarch_theologian
			clr_country_flag = patriarch_corrupt
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.077.adoption
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 50
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.077.ban
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 30
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = pms
						value = 50
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = pms
						value = 70
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		add_adm_power = -10
		add_country_modifier = { 
			name = zoroastrian_interfaith_ban
			duration = -1
		}
	}
	after = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = patriarch_zealous
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					patriarch_authority = 0.75
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_country_modifier = patriarch_zealous_fanatical
						}
					}
					trigger_switch = { 
						on_trigger = has_country_modifier
						patriarch_zealous_observant = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_zealous_observant
						}
						patriarch_zealous_pious = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_zealous_pious
						}
					}
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = patriarch_zealous_fanatical
						duration = -1
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					patriarch_authority = 0.50
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_country_modifier = patriarch_zealous_pious
						}
					}
					trigger_switch = { 
						on_trigger = has_country_modifier
						patriarch_zealous_observant = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_zealous_observant
						}
						patriarch_zealous_fanatical = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_zealous_fanatical
						}
					}
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = patriarch_zealous_pious
						duration = -1
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					patriarch_authority = 0.10
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_country_modifier = patriarch_zealous_observant
						}
					}
					trigger_switch = { 
						on_trigger = has_country_modifier
						patriarch_zealous_pious = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_zealous_pious
						}
						patriarch_zealous_fanatical = { 
							remove_country_modifier = patriarch_zealous_fanatical
						}
					}
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = patriarch_zealous_observant
						duration = -1
					}
				}
			}
			else = { 
				trigger_switch = { 
					on_trigger = has_country_modifier
					patriarch_zealous_observant = { 
						remove_country_modifier = patriarch_zealous_observant
					}
					patriarch_zealous_pious = { 
						remove_country_modifier = patriarch_zealous_pious
					}
					patriarch_zealous_fanatical = {

					}
				}
			}
		}

				patriarch_zealous_observant = { 
					remove_country_modifier = patriarch_zealous_observant
				}
				patriarch_zealous_pious = { 
					remove_country_modifier = patriarch_zealous_pious
				}
				patriarch_zealous_fanatical = { 
					remove_country_modifier = patriarch_zealous_fanatical
				}
			}

country_event = { 
	id = DG_Zoroastrian.078
	title = DG_Zoroastrian.078.t
	desc = DG_Zoroastrian.078.d
	picture = zoroastrian_religion
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		set_country_flag = zoroastrian_rivayats_collected
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Zoroastrian.078.a
		remove_country_modifier = religious_controversy
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.60
			}
			add_prestige = 15
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = 0.20
			}
			add_prestige = 12
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.20
			}
			add_prestige = 9
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				piety = -0.60
			}
			add_prestige = 6
		}
		else = { 
			add_prestige = 3
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			set_variable = { 
				which = zoroastrian_rivayats
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
